description: It attacks in a stealthy manner, without warning. Its sharp fangs are used to bite and to suck blood.

name: Golbat
description: Every once in a while, you'll see a Golbat that's missing some fangs. This happens when hunger drives it to try biting a Steel-type Pokemon.

name: Golbat
description: They can suck down over 10 ounces of blood in one go. They have been known to drink so much blood that they can no longer fly.

name: Golbat
description: Its thick fangs are hollow like straws, making them unexpectedly fragile. These fangs are specialized for sucking blood.

name: Golbat
description: Golbat bites down on prey with its four fangs and drinks the victim's blood. It becomes active on inky dark moonless nights, flying around to attack people and Pokemon.

name: Golbat
description: Golbat loves to drink the blood of living things. It is particularly active in the pitch black of night. This Pokemon flits around in the night skies, seeking fresh blood.

name: Golbat
description: Once it starts sucking blood, it does not stop until it is full. It flies at night in search of prey.

name: Golbat
description: Sometimes they drink so much blood, they can't fly anymore. Then they fall to the ground and become food for other Pokemon.

name: Oddish

name: Psyduck
description: It has been found that its brain cells are 10 times more active when Psyduck is experiencing a headache.

name: Psyduck
description: While lulling its enemies with its vacant look, this wily POKeMON will use psychokinetic powers.

name: Psyduck

description: It has mystical powers but doesn't recall that it has used them. That is why it always looks puzzled.

name: Psyduck

name: Mankey

description: Alolan home cooking involves drying Slowpoke tails and then simmering them into a salty stew.

name: Slowpoke
description: Incredibly slow and sluggish. It is quite content to loll about without worrying about the time.

name: Slowpoke
description: Slow-witted and oblivious, this Pokemon won't feel any pain if its tail gets eaten. It won't notice when its tail grows back, either.

description: Though usually dim witted, it seems to become inspired if the Shellder on its tail bites down.

description: An attached Shellder won't let go because of the tasty flavor that oozes out of its tail.

name: Slowbro
description: When a Slowpoke went hunting in the sea, its tail was bitten by a Shellder. That made it evolve into Slowbro.

name: Slowbro
description: Slowbro's tail has a Shellder firmly attached with a bite. As a result, the tail can't be used for fishing anymore. This causes Slowbro to grudgingly swim and catch prey instead.

name: Slowbro
description: It spaces out while gazing at the sea. With Shellder's poison flowing through its body, it becomes even spacier.

name: Slowbro
description: Though usually dim witted, it seems to become inspired if the SHELLDER on its tail bites down.

name: Magnemite
description: The units at the sides of its body generate antigravity energy to keep it aloft in the air.

name: Magnemite
description: It is attracted by electromagnetic waves. It may approach trainers if they are using their POKeGEAR.

name: Magnemite
description: It is born with the ability to defy gravity. It floats in air on powerful electromagnetic waves.

name: Magnemite
description: Uses anti-gravity to stay suspended. Appears without warning and uses THUNDER WAVE and similar moves.

name: Magnemite
description: Magnemite attaches itself to power lines to feed on electricity. If your house has a power outage, check your circuit breakers. You may find a large number of this Pokemon clinging to the breaker box.

name: Magnemite
description: They gather in places where electricity is available. They can be found clinging to the steel towers used to support power lines.

name: Magnemite
description: It's frequently the cause of power outages, which is why some power plants send out electrical signals that it can't stand.

name: Magnemite
description: It sends out electromagnetic waves, which let it float through the air. Touching it while it's eating electricity will give you a full-body shock.

name: Magnemite
description: Magnemite floats in the air by emitting electromagnetic waves from the units at its sides. These waves block gravity. This Pokemon becomes incapable of flight if its internal electrical supply is depleted.

name: Magnemite
description: The electricity emitted by the units on each side of its body cause it to become a strong magnet.

name: Magnemite
description: Perhaps because electrical lines are often buried these days, the number of Magnemite attacks on power plants has increased.

name: Magnemite
description: MAGNEMITE attaches itself to power lines to feed on electricity. If your house has a power outage, check your circuit breakers. You may find a large number of this POKeMON clinging to the breaker box.

name: Magnemite

name: Magnemite
description: It moves while constantly hovering. It discharges THUNDER WAVE and so on from the units at its sides.

name: Magnemite
description: It subsists on electricity. As Magnemite flies, it emits electromagnetic waves from the units on each side of its body.

name: Magnemite

name: Magnemite
description: The faster the units at its sides rotate, the greater the magnetic force they generate.

name: Magnemite
description: The units at the sides of its body generate antigravity energy to keep it aloft in the air.

name: Magnemite
description: At times, Magnemite runs out of electricity and ends up on the ground. If you give batteries to a grounded Magnemite, it'll start moving again.

name: Magnemite
description: The electromagnetic waves emitted by the units at the sides of its head expel antigravity, which allows it to float.

name: Magnemite

name: Magnemite
description: The units at its sides generate electromagnetic waves that keep it airborne. It feeds on electricity.

name: Magnemite
description: Uses antigravity to stay suspended. Appears without warning and uses THUNDER WAVE and similar moves.

name: Magnemite
description: The faster the units at its sides rotate, the greater the magnetic force they generate.

description: The units at the sides of its body generate antigravity energy to keep it aloft in the air.

description: The stronger electromagnetic waves from the three linked Magnemite are enough to dry out surrounding moisture.

name: Magneton
description: Many mysteriously appear when more sunspots dot the sun. They stop TV sets from displaying properly.

name: Magneton
description: Three MAGNEMITE are linked by a strong magnetic force. Earaches will occur if you get too close.

name: Magneton
description: Many mysteriously appear when more sunspots dot the sun. They stop TV sets from displaying properly.

name: Magneton
description: It is actually three MAGNEMITE linked by magnetism. A group can set off a magnetic storm.

name: Magneton
description: Formed by several MAGNEMITEs linked together. They frequently appear when sunspots flare up.

name: Magneton
description: Formed by several MAGNEMITE linked together. They frequently appear when sunspots flare up.

name: Magneton
description: A linked cluster formed of several MAGNEMITE. It discharges powerful magnetic waves at high voltage.

name: Magneton
description: MAGNETON emits a powerful magnetic force that is fatal to mechanical devices. As a result, large cities sound sirens to warn citizens of large-scale outbreaks of this POKeMON.

name: Magneton
description: When many MAGNETON gather together, the resulting magnetic storm disrupts radio waves.

name: Magneton
description: The MAGNEMITE are united by a magnetism so powerful, it dries all moisture in its vicinities.

name: Magneton

name: Magneton

name: Magneton

name: Magneton

name: Magneton

name: Farfetch'd
description: FARFETCH'D is always seen with a stick from a plant of some sort. Apparently, there are good sticks and bad sticks. This POKeMON has been known to fight with others over sticks.

name: Farfetch'd
description: It always walks about with a plant stalk clamped in its beak. The stalk is used for building its nest.

name: Farfetch'd
description: The plant stalk it holds is its weapon. The stalk is used like a sword to cut all sorts of things.

name: Farfetch'd
description: It is always seen with a stick from a plant. Apparently, there are good sticks and bad sticks. This POKeMON occasionally fights with others over choice sticks.

name: Farfetch'd
description: It can't live without the stalk it holds. That's why it defends the stalk from attackers with its life.

name: Farfetch'd
description: If anyone tries to disturb where the essential plant stalks grow, it uses its own stalk to thwart them.

name: Farfetch'd
description: If it eats the plant stalk it carries as emergency rations, it runs off in search of a new stalk.

description: If it eats the plant stick it carries as emergency rations, it runs off in search of a new stick.

name: Farfetch'd
description: If anyone tries to disturb where the essential plant sticks grow, it uses its own stick to thwart them.

name: Doduo
description: Its short wings make flying difficult. Instead, this POKeMON runs at high speed on developed legs.

name: Doduo
description: Even while eating or sleeping, one of the heads remains always vigilant for any sign of danger. When threatened, it flees at over 60 miles per hour.

name: Doduo
description: The brains in its two heads appear to communicate emotions to each other with a telepathic power.

name: Doduo
description: By alternately raising and lowering its two heads, it balances itself to be more stable while running.

name: Doduo
description: By alternately raising and lowering its two heads, it balances itself to be more stable while running.

name: Doduo
description: It races through grassy plains with powerful strides, leaving footprints up to four inches deep.

name: Doduo
description: A two-headed POKeMON that was discovered as a sudden mutation. It runs at a pace of over 60 miles per hour.

name: Doduo
description: It lives on a grassy plain where it can see a long way. If it sees an enemy, it runs away at 60 mph.

name: Doduo
description: It races through grassy plains with powerful strides, leaving footprints up to four inches deep.

name: Doduo

name: Doduo
description: The brains in its two heads appear to communicate emotions to each other with a telepathic power.

name: Doduo
description: Doduo's two heads never sleep at the same time. Its two heads take turns sleeping, so one head can always keep watch for enemies while the other one sleeps.

name: Doduo
description: Doduo's two heads contain completely identical brains. A scientific study reported that on rare occasions, there will be examples of this Pokemon possessing different sets of brains.

name: Doduo
description: Its short wings make flying difficult. Instead, this Pokemon runs at high speed on developed legs.

name: Doduo
description: A bird that makes up for its poor flying with its fast foot speed. Leaves giant footprints.

name: Dodrio
description: Apparently, the heads aren't the only parts of the body that Dodrio has three of. It has three sets of hearts and lungs as well, so it is capable of running long distances without rest.

name: Dodrio
description: A peculiar POKeMON species with three heads. It vigorously races across grassy plains even in arid seasons with little rainfall.

name: Dodrio
description: When DODUO evolves into this odd breed, one of its heads splits into two. It runs at nearly 40 mph.

name: Dodrio
description: It collects data and plans three times as wisely, but it may think too much and fall into a state of immobility.

name: Dodrio
description: Uses its three brains to execute complex plans. While two heads sleep, one head is said to stay awake.

name: Dodrio
description: An odd species that is rarely found. The three heads respectively represent joy, sadness, and anger.

name: Dodrio
description: Apparently, the heads aren't the only parts of the body that DODRIO has three of. It has three sets of hearts and lungs as well, so it is capable of running long distances without rest.

name: Dodrio

name: Dodrio
description: If one of the heads gets to eat, the others will be satisfied, too, and they will stop squabbling.

name: Seel

name: Seel

name: Seel

name: Seel

name: Seel

name: Seel

name: Seel

description: Stores thermal energy in its body. Swims at a steady 8 knots even in intensely cold waters.

name: Dewgong
description: Its entire body is a snowy-white. Unharmed by even intense cold, it swims powerfully in icy waters.

name: Dewgong
description: Its streamlined body has little drag in water. The colder the temperature, the friskier it gets.

name: Dewgong

name: Grimer
description: The wastewater coming from factories is clean these days, so Grimer have nothing to eat. They're said to be on the verge of extinction.

name: Grimer
description: Wherever GRIMER has passed, so many germs are left behind that no plants will ever grow again.

name: Grimer
description: As it moves, it loses bits of its body from which new GRIMER emerge. This worsens the stench around it.

name: Grimer
description: Made of hardened sludge. It smells too putrid to touch. Even weeds won't grow in its path.

name: Grimer
description: Appears in filthy areas. Thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.

name: Grimer
description: It was born from sludge on the ocean floor. In a sterile environment, the germs within its body can't multiply, and it dies.

name: Grimer
description: It was born when sludge in a dirty stream was exposed to the moon's X-rays. It appears among filth.

name: Grimer
description: Its main source of food is the slimy industrial waste of factories. This Pokemon's numbers have been decreasing in recent years.

name: Grimer
description: Grimer emerged from the sludge that settled on a polluted seabed. This Pokemon loves anything filthy. It constantly leaks a horribly germ-infested fluid from all over its body.

name: Grimer
description: Grimer's sludgy and rubbery body can be forced through any opening, however small it may be. This Pokemon enters sewer pipes to drink filthy wastewater.

description: Appears in filthy areas. It thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.

name: Grimer
description: Sludge exposed to X-rays from the moon transformed into Grimer. It loves feeding on filthy things.

name: Muk
description: Smells so awful, it can cause fainting. Through degeneration, it lost its sense of smell.

name: Muk
description: Smells so awful, it can cause fainting. Through degeneration of its nose, it lost its sense of smell.

name: Muk
description: Thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.

name: Muk
description: It prefers warm and humid habitats. In the summertime, the toxic substances in its body intensify, making MUK reek like putrid kitchen garbage.

name: Muk
description: A toxic fluid seeps from its body. The fluid instantly kills plants and trees on contact.

name: Muk
description: They love to gather in smelly areas where sludge accumulates, making the stench around them worse.

name: Muk

name: Muk

name: Muk

description: They love to gather in smelly areas where sludge accumulates, making the stench around them worse.

name: Shellder
description: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.

name: Shellder
description: It swims facing backward by opening and closing its two-piece shell. It is surprisingly fast.

name: Shellder

name: Shellder

name: Shellder

description: It swims backward by opening and closing its two shells. Its large tongue is always kept hanging out.

description: At night, this Pokemon uses its broad tongue to burrow a hole in the seafloor sand and then sleep in it. While it is sleeping, Shellder closes its shell, but leaves its tongue hanging out.

name: Cloyster
description: CLOYSTER that live in seas with harsh tidal currents grow large, sharp spikes on their shells.

name: Cloyster
description: For protection, it uses its harder-than-diamonds shell. It also shoots spikes from the shell.

name: Cloyster
description: Once it slams its shell shut, it is impossible to open, even by those with superior strength.

name: Cloyster
description: It fights by keeping its shell tightly shut for protection and by shooting spikes to repel foes.

name: Cloyster
description: It swims in the sea by swallowing water, then jetting it out toward the rear. The CLOYSTER shoots spikes from its shell using the same system.

name: Cloyster
description: When attacked, it launches its horns in quick volleys. Its innards have never been seen.

name: Cloyster
description: Its shell is extremely hard. It cannot be shattered, even with a bomb. The shell opens only when it is attacking.

name: Cloyster

name: Cloyster

name: Gastly
description: When exposed to a strong wind, a GASTLY's gaseous body quickly dwindles away. They cluster under the eaves of houses to escape the ravages of wind.

name: Gastly
description: Its thin body is made of gas. It can envelop an opponent of any size and cause suffocation.

name: Gastly
description: Said to appear in decrepit, deserted buildings. It has no real shape, as it appears to be made of a gas.

name: Gastly
description: Poisonous gas comprises 95% of its body. It's said that the remaining 5% is made up of the souls of those who died from the gas.

name: Gastly
description: It's said that gas emanating from a graveyard was possessed by the grievances of the deceased and thus became a Pokemon.

name: Gastly
description: Although Gastly is barely visible, when it's near, a faint sweet smell lingers.

name: Gastly
description: Should a strange light be seen flickering in an abandoned building, Gastly is lurking there.

name: Gastly
description: Gastly is largely composed of gaseous matter. When exposed to a strong wind, the gaseous body quickly dwindles away. Groups of this Pokemon cluster under the eaves of houses to escape the ravages of wind.

name: Gastly
description: Born from gases, anyone would faint if engulfed by its gaseous body, which contains poison.

description: With its gas-like body, it can sneak into any place it desires. However, it can be blown away by wind.

name: Gastly

name: Gastly
description: This Pokemon's body is 95% made up of gases, which are blown away by strong gusts of wind.

name: Gastly
description: Almost invisible, this gaseous POKeMON cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice.

name: Gastly
description: A being that exists as a thin gas. It can topple an Indian elephant by enveloping the prey in two seconds.

name: Haunter
description: If a HAUNTER beckons you while it is floating in darkness, don't approach it. This POKeMON will try to lick you with its tongue and steal your life away.

name: Haunter
description: It can slip through any obstacle. It lurks inside walls to keep an eye on its foes.

name: Haunter
description: Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said to be from another dimension.

name: Haunter
description: Its tongue is made of gas. If licked, its victim starts shaking constantly until death eventually comes.

name: Haunter
description: It hides in the dark, planning to take the life of the next living thing that wanders close by.

name: Haunter
description: HAUNTER is a dangerous POKeMON. If one beckons you while floating in darkness, you must never approach it. This POKeMON will try to lick you with its tongue and steal your life away.

name: Haunter
description: If you get the feeling of being watched in darkness when nobody is around, HAUNTER is there.

name: Haunter

name: Haunter

name: Haunter
description: Its tongue is made of gas. If licked, its victim starts shaking constantly until death eventually comes.

name: Haunter

name: Haunter
description: It's dangerous to go outside alone on nights when you're feeling sad. Haunter will catch you, and you won't be able to go back home.

name: Haunter
description: On moonless nights, Haunter searches for someone to curse, so it's best not to go out walking around.

name: Haunter
description: It fears the light and revels in the dark. It may be on the verge of extinction in cities that stay brightly lit at night.

name: Haunter
description: It strikes at humans from total darkness. Those licked by its cold tongue grow weaker with each passing day until they die.

name: Haunter
description: Haunter is a dangerous Pokemon. If one beckons you while floating in darkness, you must never approach it. This Pokemon will try to lick you with its tongue and steal your life away.

name: Haunter
description: It licks with its gaseous tongue to steal the victim's life force. It lurks in darkness for prey.

name: Haunter

name: Haunter

name: Gengar
description: A Gengar is close by if you feel a sudden chill. It may be trying to lay a curse on you.

name: Gengar
description: Even your home isn't safe. Gengar will lurk in whatever dark corner of a room it can find and wait for its chance to catch its prey.

name: Gengar
description: On the night of a full moon, if shadows move on their own and laugh, it must be Gengar's doing.

name: Gengar
description: You can hear tales told all over the world about how Gengar will pay a visit to children who are naughty.

name: Gengar
description: It apparently wishes for a traveling companion. Since it was once human itself, it tries to create one by taking the lives of other humans.

name: Gengar
description: Should you feel yourself attacked by a sudden chill, it is evidence of an approaching Gengar. There is no escaping it. Give up.

name: Gengar
description: Sometimes, on a dark night, your shadow thrown by a streetlight will suddenly and startlingly overtake you. It is actually a Gengar running past you, pretending to be your shadow.

name: Gengar
description: Hiding in people's shadows at night, it absorbs their heat. The chill it causes makes the victims shake.

name: Gengar
description: It is said to emerge from darkness to steal the lives of those who become lost in mountains.

name: Gengar
description: The leer that floats in darkness belongs to a Gengar delighting in casting curses on people.

name: Gengar
description: To steal the life of its target, it slips into the prey's shadow and silently waits for an opportunity.

name: Gengar
description: It steals heat from its surroundings. If you feel a sudden chill, it is certain that a GENGAR appeared.

name: Gengar
description: The leer that floats in darkness belongs to a GENGAR delighting in casting curses on people.

name: Gengar
description: It hides in shadows. It is said that if Gengar is hiding, it cools the area by nearly 10 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Gengar
description: Lurking in the shadowy corners of rooms, it awaits chances to steal its prey's life force.

name: Onix
description: There is a magnet in its brain that prevents an ONIX from losing direction while tunneling. As it grows older, its body becomes steadily rounder and smoother.

name: Onix
description: As it grows, the stone portions of its body harden to become similar to black-colored diamonds.

name: Onix
description: It usually lives underground. It searches for food while boring its way through the ground at 50 miles per hour.

name: Onix
description: Burrows at high speed in search of food. The tunnels it leaves are used as homes by DIGLETTs.

name: Onix
description: As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.

name: Onix
description: It rapidly bores through the ground at 50 mph by squirming and twisting its massive, rugged body.

name: Onix
description: As it grows, the stone portions of its body harden to become similar to a diamond, but colored black.

name: Onix
description: It twists and squirms through the ground. The thunderous roar of its tunneling echoes a long way.

name: Onix
description: ONIX has a magnet in its brain. It acts as a compass so that this POKeMON does not lose direction while it is tunneling. As it grows older, its body becomes increasingly rounder and smoother.

name: Onix
description: When it travels underground, it causes rumbling and tremors. It can move at 50 mph.

name: Onix
description: It twists and squirms through the ground. The thunderous roar of its tunneling echoes a long way.

description: As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.

name: Onix

name: Drowzee
description: It can tell what people are dreaming by sniffing with its big nose. It loves fun dreams.

name: Drowzee
description: It remembers every dream it eats. It rarely eats the dreams of adults because children's are much tastier.

name: Drowzee
description: If you think that you had a good dream but you can't remember it, a DROWZEE has probably eaten it.

name: Drowzee
description: It can tell what people are dreaming by sniffing with its big nose. It loves fun dreams.

name: Drowzee
description: Puts enemies to sleep, then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating only bad dreams.

name: Drowzee
description: Puts enemies to sleep, then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating only bad dreams.

name: Drowzee
description: A descendent of the legendary animal baku, which is said to eat dreams. It is skilled at hypnotism.

name: Drowzee
description: If your nose becomes itchy while you are sleeping, it's a sure sign that one of these POKeMON is standing above your pillow and trying to eat your dream through your nostrils.

name: Drowzee
description: When it twitches its nose, it can tell where someone is sleeping and what that person is dreaming about.

name: Drowzee
description: It remembers every dream it eats. It rarely eats the dreams of adults because children's are much tastier.

name: Drowzee

name: Drowzee
description: A Pokemon that nourishes itself by eating dreams, it is thought to share common ancestry with Munna and Musharna.

name: Drowzee
description: It finds really fun dreams tasty. When it makes friends with people, it may show them the most delicious dreams it's ever eaten.

name: Drowzee
description: It can be spotted near recreational facilities, intending to eat the pleasant dreams of children who enjoyed themselves there that day.

name: Drowzee
description: If you sleep by it all the time, it will sometimes show you dreams it has eaten in the past.

name: Hypno
description: Seeing its swinging pendulum can induce sleep in three seconds, even in someone who just woke up.

name: Hypno
description: Hypno holds a pendulum in its hand. The arcing movement and glitter of the pendulum lull the foe into a deep state of hypnosis. While this Pokemon searches for prey, it polishes the pendulum.

name: Hypno
description: While it is an extremely dangerous Pokemon, people who are in need of a good, sound sleep call it their savior.

name: Hypno
description: As a matter of course, it makes anyone it meets fall asleep and has a taste of their dreams. Anyone having a good dream, it carries off.

name: Hypno
description: In Alola, Komala is Hypno's main target. It rarely harms people.

name: Hypno
description: There are some Hypno that assist doctors with patients who can't sleep at night in hospitals.

name: Hypno
description: Avoid eye contact if you come across one. It will try to put you to sleep by using its pendulum.

name: Hypno
description: Seeing its swinging pendulum can induce sleep in three seconds, even in someone who just woke up.

name: Hypno

name: Hypno

name: Hypno

name: Hypno

name: Hypno
description: It carries a pendulum-like device. There once was an incident in which it took away a child it hypnotized.

name: Krabby
description: If it senses danger approaching, it cloaks itself with bubbles from its mouth so it will look bigger.

name: Krabby
description: It can be found near the sea. The large pincers grow back if they are torn out of their sockets.

name: Krabby

name: Voltorb
description: VOLTORB was first sighted at a company that manufactures POKe BALLS. The link between that sighting and the fact that this POKeMON looks very similar to a POKe BALL remains a mystery.

name: Voltorb
description: VOLTORB is extremely sensitive - it explodes at the slightest of shocks. It is rumored that it was first created when a POKe BALL was exposed to a powerful pulse of energy.

name: Voltorb
description: A life-form whose identity is unknown. It is said to SCREECH or suddenly SELFDESTRUCT.

name: Voltorb
description: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a POKe BALL, it has zapped many people.

name: Electrode
description: It stores an overflowing amount of electric energy inside its body. Even a small shock makes it explode.

name: Electrode

name: Exeggcute
description: These Pokemon get nervous when they're not in a group of six. The minute even one member of the group goes missing, Exeggcute become cowardly.

description: When the stars twinkle at night, it floats up from the sea floor, and its body's center core flickers.

name: Staryu
description: Even if its body is torn, it can regenerate as long as the glowing central core remains intact.

name: Staryu
description: At night, the center of its body slowly flickers with the same rhythm as a human heartbeat.

name: Staryu
description: As long as the center section is unharmed, it can grow back fully even if it is chopped to bits.

name: Staryu
description: If its body is torn, it can grow back if the red core remains. The core flashes at midnight.

name: Staryu
description: It gathers with others in the night and makes its red core glow on and off with the twinkling stars. It can regenerate limbs if they are severed from its body.

name: Staryu
description: Fish Pokemon nibble at it, but Staryu isn't bothered. Its body regenerates quickly, even if part of it is completely torn off.

name: Staryu
description: In many places, there are folktales of stardust falling into the ocean and becoming Staryu.

name: Staryu
description: No number of injuries can bother Staryu. Its amazing regenerative powers return it to its previous state in half a day!

name: Staryu
description: As long as the center section is unharmed, this Pokemon can grow back fully even if it is chopped to bits.

name: Staryu
description: If you visit a beach at the end of summer, you'll be able to see groups of Staryu lighting up in a steady rhythm.

name: Starmie
description: This Pokemon has an organ known as its core. The organ glows in seven colors when Starmie is unleashing its potent psychic powers.

name: Starmie
description: Starmie swims by spinning its body at high speed. As this Pokemon cruises through the ocean, it absorbs tiny plankton.

name: Starmie
description: Starmie's center section--the core--glows brightly in seven colors. Because of its luminous nature, this Pokemon has been given the nickname "the gem of the sea."

name: Starmie
description: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value the core as a gem.

name: Starmie
description: Its core shines in many colors and sends radio signals into space to communicate with something.

name: Starmie
description: At the center of its body is a red core, which sends mysterious radio signals into the night sky.

name: Starmie
description: Regardless of the environment it lives in, its body grows to form a symmetrical geometric shape.

name: Mr. Mime
description: It is a pantomime expert that can create invisible but solid walls using miming gestures.

name: Mr. Mime
description: It is adept at conning people. It is said to be able to create walls out of thin air by miming.

name: Mr. Mime

name: Mr. Mime

name: Mr. Mime

name: Mr. Mime

name: Mr. Mime

name: Scyther

name: Scyther

name: Scyther

name: Scyther

name: Jynx

description: It grips prey with its powerful pincers and will not let go until the prey is torn in half.

name: Pinsir
description: It swings its long pincer horns wildly to attack. During cold periods, it hides deep in forests.

name: Pinsir

name: Pinsir
description: Pinsir is astoundingly strong. It can grip a foe weighing twice its weight in its horns and easily lift it. This Pokemon's movements turn sluggish in cold places.

description: It grips prey with its pincers until the prey is torn in half. What it can't tear, it tosses far.

description: They fight each other by locking horns. The herd's protector takes pride in its battle-scarred horns.

name: Tauros

name: Tauros
description: When it is about to tackle, it whips its body repeatedly with its three long tails.

name: Tauros

name: Tauros

description: This weak and pathetic Pokemon gets easily pushed along rivers when there are strong currents.

description: It is virtually worthless in terms of both power and speed. It is the most weak and pathetic Pokemon in the world.

name: Magikarp
description: Famous for being very unreliable. It can be found swimming in seas, lakes, rivers and shallow puddles.

name: Magikarp
description: Thanks to their strong hold on life, dirty water doesn't bother them at all. They live in waters all over the world!

name: Magikarp
description: Its reckless leaps make it easy pickings for predators. On the bright side, many Pokemon enjoy longer life spans, thanks to Magikarp.

name: Magikarp

name: Magikarp

name: Magikarp

name: Hoothoot
description: It marks time precisely. Some countries consider it to be a wise friend, versed in the world's ways.

name: Noctowl
description: When it needs to think, it rotates its head 180 degrees to sharpen its intellectual power.

name: Noctowl
description: Its eyes are specially adapted. They concentrate even faint light and enable it to see in the dark.

name: Noctowl
description: If it flips its head upside down, it's a sign that it is engaged in very complex thinking.

name: Noctowl
description: Its eyes are special. They can pick out objects as long as there is the tiniest amount of light.

name: Noctowl
description: It unfailingly catches prey in darkness. NOCTOWL owe their success to superior vision that allows them to see in minimal light, and to their supple and silent wings.

name: Noctowl
description: When it needs to think, it rotates its head 180 degrees to sharpen its intellectual power.

name: Noctowl

name: Noctowl

name: Noctowl
description: Its extremely soft feathers make no sound in flight. It silently sneaks up on prey without being detected.

name: Noctowl

name: Ledyba
description: These very cowardly Pokemon join together and use Reflect to protect their nest.

name: Ledyba
description: This Pokemon is very sensitive to cold. In the warmth of Alola, it appears quite lively.

name: Ledyba
description: They communicate with one another using bodily fluids that give off odors. When they're angry, their odor smells sour.

name: Ledyba
description: They are timid and grow uneasy when not in a swarm with others of their kind. The pattern on their backs differs slightly from one to another.

name: Ledyba
description: Ledyba secretes an aromatic fluid from where its legs join its body. This fluid is used for communicating with others. This Pokemon conveys its feelings to others by altering the fluid's scent.

name: Ledyba
description: It is timid and clusters together with others. The fluid secreted by its feet indicates its location.

name: Ledyba
description: When the weather turns cold, lots of Ledyba gather from everywhere to cluster and keep each other warm.

name: Ledyba
description: It is so timid, it can't move if it isn't with a swarm of others. It conveys its feelings with scent.

name: Ledyba

name: Ledian
description: The spot patterns on its back grow larger or smaller depending on the number of stars in the night sky.

name: Ledian
description: It uses starlight as energy. When more stars appear at night, the patterns on its back grow larger.

name: Ledian
description: It uses starlight as energy. When more stars appear at night, the patterns on its back grow larger.

name: Ledian
description: The spot patterns on its back grow larger or smaller depending on the number of stars in the night sky.

name: Ledian
description: When the stars flicker in the night sky, it flutters about, scattering a glowing powder.

name: Ledian
description: It is said that in lands with clean air, where the stars fill the sky, there live Ledian in countless numbers. There is a good reason for this--the Pokemon uses the light of the stars as its energy.

name: Ledian
description: It is said that in lands with clean air, where the stars fill the sky, there live many LEDIAN. For good reason, they use the light of the stars as energy.

name: Ledian

name: Ledian
description: When the stars flicker in the night sky, it flutters about, scattering a glowing powder.

name: Ledian
description: While it's believed that starlight provides it with energy, this Pokemon also loves to eat berries. In the daytime, it curls up in the grass to sleep.

name: Ledian
description: It flies through the night sky, sprinkling sparkly dust. According to some, if that dust sticks to you, good things will happen to you.

name: Ledian
description: It's said that the patterns on its back are related to the stars in the night sky, but the details of that relationship remain unclear.

name: Ledian
description: In battle, it throws punches with all four arms. The power of each individual blow is piddly, so it aims to win by quantity rather than quality.

description: When the stars flicker in the night sky, it flutters about, scattering a glowing powder.

name: Ledian

name: Spinarak
description: It lies still in the same pose for days in its web, waiting for its unsuspecting prey to wander close.

name: Spinarak
description: The web it spins can be considered its second nervous system. It is said that a SPINARAK determines its prey by the tiny vibrations it feels through the web.

name: Spinarak
description: It sets a trap by spinning a web with thin but strong silk. It waits motionlessly for prey to arrive.

name: Spinarak
description: It spins a web using fine--but durable--thread. It then waits patiently for prey to be trapped.

name: Spinarak

name: Spinarak
description: The web spun by Spinarak can be considered its second nervous system. It is said that this Pokemon can determine what kind of prey is touching its web just by the tiny vibrations it feels through the web's strands.

name: Spinarak
description: It waits intently until its preferred prey, Cutiefly, gets caught in its web. In fact, it's quite a patient Pokemon.

name: Spinarak
description: It lies still in the same pose for days in its web, waiting for its unsuspecting prey to wander close.

name: Spinarak
description: With threads from its mouth, it fashions sturdy webs that won't break even if you set a rock on them.

name: Spinarak
description: Some fishermen weave its sturdy thread into nets to catch fish Pokemon.

name: Ariados
description: A single strand of a special string is endlessly spun out of its rear. The string leads back to its nest.

name: Ariados
description: ARIADOS's feet are tipped with tiny hooked claws that enable it to scuttle on ceilings and vertical walls. This POKeMON constricts the foe with thin and strong silk webbing.

name: Ariados
description: Rather than making a nest in one specific spot, it wanders in search of food after darkness falls.

name: Ariados
description: A single strand of a special string is endlessly spun out of its rear. The string leads back to its nest.

name: Ariados
description: It attaches silk to its prey and sets it free. Later, it tracks the silk to the prey and its friends.

name: Ariados

name: Ariados

name: Ariados

name: Crobat
description: Over the course of evolution, its hind legs turned into wings. By alternately resting its front and rear wings, it can fly all day without having to stop.

name: Crobat
description: Silent and swift in its four-winged flight, it bites down on its prey before they realize what's happening. In a heartbeat, it drains their blood.

name: Crobat
description: Its fangs are so sharp, if it bites you in the dark and sucks your blood, you won't notice any pain or realize you've been bitten.

name: Crobat
description: It feeds on the blood of living people and Pokemon. If it can't drink any blood for even a short while, it becomes weak and unable to fly.

name: Crobat
description: Both of its legs have turned into wings. Without a sound, Crobat flies swiftly toward its prey and sinks its fangs into the nape of its target's neck.

name: Crobat
description: This Pokemon flaps its four wings skillfully. Crobat can fly through cramped caves without needing to slow down.

name: Crobat
description: If this Pokemon is flying by fluttering only a pair of wings on either the forelegs or hind legs, it's proof that Crobat has been flying a long distance. It switches the wings it uses if it is tired.

name: Crobat
description: Having four wings allows it to fly more quickly and quietly so it can sneak up on prey without its noticing.

name: Crobat
description: It flies so silently through the dark on its four wings that it may not be noticed even when nearby.

name: Crobat
description: Having four wings allows it to fly more quickly and quietly so it can sneak up on prey without its noticing.

name: Crobat
description: The transformation of its legs into wings made it better at flying, but more clumsy at walking.

name: Crobat

name: Crobat

name: Chinchou
description: Its two antennae glow softly to lure in prey, making it a useful Pokemon for night fishing.

name: Chinchou
description: On the dark ocean floor, its only means of communication is its constantly flashing lights.

name: Chinchou
description: Its antennae, which evolved from a fin, have both positive and negative charges flowing through them.

name: Chinchou
description: Chinchou blink their shining antennae at one another to claim their respective turf.

name: Chinchou
description: It lives in the depths beyond the reach of sunlight. It flashes lights on its antennae to communicate with others of its kind.

name: Chinchou

name: Chinchou

name: Chinchou
description: It shoots positive and negative electricity between the tips of its two antennae and zaps its enemies.

name: Lanturn
description: Should you peer into the ocean at night and see a light shining like the stars, that is Lanturn.

name: Lanturn
description: LANTURN is nicknamed "the deep-sea star" for its illuminated antenna. This POKeMON produces light by causing a chemical reaction between bacteria and its bodily fluids inside the antenna.

name: Lanturn
description: The light it emits is so bright that it can illuminate the sea's surface from a depth of over three miles.

name: Lanturn
description: It blinds prey with an intense burst of light, then swallows the immobilized prey in a single gulp.

name: Lanturn
description: The light it emits is so bright that it can illuminate the sea's surface from a depth of over three miles.

name: Pichu
description: The electric sacs in its cheeks are small. If even a little electricity leaks, it becomes shocked.

name: Pichu
description: It is not yet skilled at storing electricity. It may send out a jolt if amused or startled.

name: Pichu
description: Despite its small size, it can zap even adult humans. However, if it does so, it also surprises itself.

name: Pichu
description: It is unskilled at storing electric power. Any kind of shock causes it to discharge energy spontaneously.

name: Pichu
description: PICHU charges itself with electricity more easily on days with thunderclouds or when the air is very dry. You can hear the crackling of static electricity coming off this POKeMON.

name: Pichu
description: It still can't use electricity well. When it's surprised or excited, it discharges electricity unintentionally.

name: Pichu

name: Cleffa
description: When numerous meteors illuminate the night sky, sightings of CLEFFA strangely increase.

name: Cleffa
description: If the impact site of a meteorite is found, this POKeMON is certain to be within the immediate area.

name: Cleffa
description: On nights with many shooting stars, CLEFFA can be seen dancing in a ring. They dance through the night and stop only at the break of day, when these POKeMON quench their thirst with the morning dew.

name: Cleffa
description: Because of its unusual, starlike silhouette, people believe that it came here on a meteor.

name: Cleffa
description: On nights with many shooting stars, CLEFFA can be seen dancing in a ring. They dance until daybreak, when they quench their thirst with the morning dew.

name: Cleffa

name: Cleffa
description: Many appear when the night skies are filled with shooting stars. They disappear with sunrise.

name: Igglybuff
description: It has a very soft body. If it starts to roll, it will bounce all over and be impossible to stop.

name: Igglybuff
description: Its extremely flexible and elastic body makes it bounce continuously--anytime, anywhere.

name: Igglybuff
description: It moves by bouncing along. As it moves a lot, it sweats, and its body gives off a sweet aroma.

name: Igglybuff
description: IGGLYBUFF's vocal chords are not sufficiently developed. It would hurt its throat if it were to sing too much. This POKeMON gargles with freshwater from a clean stream.

name: Igglybuff
description: IGGLYBUFF has a soft and plushy body that feels very much like a marshmallow. From this body wafts a gently sweet fragrance that soothes and calms the emotions of its foes.

name: Igglybuff
description: Its extremely flexible and elastic body makes it bounce continuously--anytime, anywhere.

name: Igglybuff
description: It has a very soft body. If it starts to roll, it will bounce all over and be impossible to stop.

name: Igglybuff
description: Its soft and pliable body is very bouncy. When it sings continuously with all its might, its body steadily turns a deepening pink color.

name: Igglybuff
description: Taking advantage of the softness of its body, Igglybuff moves as if bouncing. Its body turns a deep pink when its temperature rises.

name: Igglybuff
description: Igglybuff loves to sing. Its marshmallow-like body gives off a faint sweet smell.

name: Igglybuff
description: Left to its own devices, it will constantly practice singing. You should make it take a break so it doesn't hurt its throat.

name: Igglybuff

name: Murkrow

name: Slowking

name: Slowking

name: Stantler
description: Stantler's magnificent antlers were traded at high prices as works of art. As a result, this Pokemon was hunted close to extinction by those who were after the priceless antlers.

name: Smoochum
description: When it examines things, before touching them with its hands, it makes lip contact and then diligently licks all the dirt off its lips.

name: Smoochum
description: Highly perceptive sensors, Smoochum's lips are kept moist by its daily application of tree sap.

name: Smoochum

name: Smoochum

name: Elekid
description: A weak electric current flows between its horns. Sticking a hand there shocks the unwary.

name: Elekid
description: When it hears the crash of thunder, Elekid's mood improves. It can be useful to record that sound and play it when Elekid's feeling down.

name: Elekid
description: Spinning its arms around to generate electricity makes the area between its horns shine light blue.

name: Elekid
description: When a storm approaches, this Pokemon gets restless. Once Elekid hears the sound of thunder, it gets full-on rowdy.

name: Elekid

name: Elekid
description: Spinning its arms around to generate electricity makes the area between its horns shine light blue.

name: Elekid

name: Elekid
description: Even in the most vicious storm, this Pokemon plays happily if thunder rumbles in the sky.

name: Elekid
description: It's not good at storing electricity yet. This Pokemon sneaks into people's homes, looking for electrical outlets to eat electricity from.

name: Elekid
description: It generates electricity by whirling its arms. However, it can't store the energy it makes.

name: Elekid
description: It rotates its arms to generate electricity, but it tires easily, so it only charges up a little bit.

name: Magby
description: It is found in volcanic craters. Its body heat exceeds 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit, so don't underestimate it.

name: Magby
description: MAGBY's state of health is determined by observing the fire it breathes. If the POKeMON is spouting yellow flames from its mouth, it is in good health. When it is fatigued, black smoke will be mixed in with the flames.

name: Magby

name: Magby

name: Magby
description: Each and every time it inhales and exhales, hot embers dribble out of its mouth and nostrils.

name: Magby

name: Miltank
description: If it is around babies, the milk it produces contains much more nutrition than usual.

name: Miltank
description: It gives over five gallons of milk daily. Its sweet milk is enjoyed by children and grown-ups alike. People who can't drink milk turn it into yogurt and eat it instead.

name: Miltank
description: Its milk is packed with nutrition, making it the ultimate beverage for the sick or weary.

name: Blissey
description: Blissey senses sadness with its fluffy coat of fur. If it does so, this Pokemon will rush over to a sad person, no matter how far away, to share a Lucky Egg that brings a smile to any face.

name: Blissey

name: Blissey

name: Numel

name: Bagon

name: Bagon

name: Mismagius

name: Mismagius
description: It chants incantations. While they usually torment targets, some chants bring happiness.

name: Mismagius
description: Its muttered curses can cause awful headaches or terrifying visions that torment others.

name: Mismagius
description: Its cries sound like incantations to torment the foe. It appears where you least expect it.

name: Mismagius
description: It appears as if from nowhere--muttering incantations, placing curses, and giving people terrifying visions.

name: Mismagius
description: Mismagius have been known to cast spells to make people fall in love, so some people search for this Pokemon as if their life depended on it.

name: Mismagius
description: Feared for its wrath and the curses it spreads, this Pokemon will also, on a whim, cast spells that help people.

name: Mismagius
description: Its cry sounds like an incantation. It is said the cry may rarely be imbued with happiness-giving power.

name: Mismagius
description: Its cries sound like incantations. Those hearing it are tormented by headaches and hallucinations.

name: Honchkrow
description: It is merciless by nature. It is said that it never forgives the mistakes of its MURKROW followers.

name: Honchkrow
description: If one utters a deep cry, many MURKROW gather quickly. For this, it is called "Summoner of Night."

name: Honchkrow
description: If one utters a deep cry, many Murkrow gather quickly. For this, it is called "Summoner of Night."

name: Honchkrow
description: If its Murkrow cronies fail to catch food for it, or if it feels they have betrayed it, it will hunt them down wherever they are and punish them.

name: Honchkrow
description: It will absolutely not forgive failure from or betrayal by its goons. It has no choice in this if it wants to maintain the order of the flock.

name: Honchkrow
description: Its goons take care of most of the fighting for it. The only time it dirties its own hands is in delivering a final blow to finish off an opponent.

name: Honchkrow
description: Becoming active at night, it is known to swarm with numerous MURKROW in tow.

name: Honchkrow
description: If one utters a deep cry, many Murkrow gather quickly. For this, it is called "Summoner of Night."

name: Honchkrow
description: A single cry from this nocturnal Pokemon, and more than a hundred of its Murkrow cronies will assemble.

name: Honchkrow
description: Becoming active at night, it is known to swarm with numerous Murkrow in tow.

name: Honchkrow
description: It makes its MURKROW cronies bring it food. It idles its time away, grooming itself in its nest.

name: Glameow
description: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.

name: Glameow
description: With its sharp glare, it puts foes in a mild hypnotic state. It is a very fickle Pokemon.

name: Glameow
description: When it's happy, GLAMEOW demonstrates beautiful movements of its tail, like a dancing ribbon.

name: Glameow
description: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.

name: Glameow
description: It hides its spiteful tendency of hooking its claws into the nose of its Trainer if it isn't fed.

name: Glameow
description: When it's happy, Glameow demonstrates beautiful movements of its tail, like a dancing ribbon.

name: Glameow
description: It hides its spiteful tendency of hooking its claws into the nose of its Trainer if it isn't fed.

name: Purugly
description: It would claim another Pokemon's nest as its own if it finds a nest sufficiently comfortable.

name: Purugly
description: To make itself appear intimidatingly beefy, it tightly cinches its waist with its twin tails.

name: Purugly
description: It binds its body with its tails to make itself look bigger. If it locks eyes, it will glare ceaselessly.

name: Purugly
description: It would claim another Pokemon's nest as its own if it finds a nest sufficiently comfortable.

description: It binds its body with its tails to make itself look bigger. If it locks eyes, it will glare ceaselessly.

name: Purugly
description: To make itself appear intimidatingly beefy, it tightly cinches its waist with its twin tails.

name: Purugly
description: It is a brazen brute that barges its way into another Pokemon's nest and claims it as its own.

name: Chingling
description: Each time it hops, it makes a ringing sound. It deafens foes by emitting high-frequency cries.

name: Chingling
description: There is an orb inside its mouth. When it hops, the orb bounces all over and makes a ringing sound.

name: Chingling
description: It emits high-frequency cries that people can't hear. Once it starts, it can cry for an awfully long time.

name: Chingling
description: There is an orb inside its mouth. When it hops, the orb bounces all over and makes a ringing sound.

name: Chingling
description: Each time it hops, it makes a ringing sound. It deafens foes by emitting high-frequency cries.

description: It emits cries by agitating an orb at the back of its throat. It moves with flouncing hops.

name: Chingling
description: There is an orb inside its mouth. When it hops, the orb bounces all over and makes a ringing sound.

name: Stunky
description: It protects itself by spraying a noxious fluid from its rear. The stench lingers for 24 hours.

name: Stunky
description: It sprays a foul fluid from its rear. Its stench spreads over a mile radius, driving Pokemon away.

name: Stunky
description: It sprays a foul fluid from its rear. Its stench spreads over a mile radius, driving Pokemon away.

name: Stunky
description: The foul fluid from its rear is so revolting that it can make people feel queasy up to a mile and a quarter away.

name: Stunky
description: It sprays a foul fluid from its rear. Its stench spreads over a mile radius, driving Pokemon away.

name: Stunky
description: It sprays a nose-curling, stinky fluid from its rear to repel attackers.

name: Stunky
description: It protects itself by spraying a noxious fluid from its rear. The stench lingers for 24 hours.

name: Stunky

name: Stunky
description: If it lifts its tail and points its rear at you, beware. It's about to spray you with a fluid stinky enough to make you faint.

name: Skuntank
description: It digs holes in the ground to make its nest. The stench of the fluid it lets fly from the tip of its tail is extremely potent.

name: Skuntank
description: In its belly, it reserves stinky fluid that it shoots from its tail during battle. As this Pokemon's diet varies, so does the stench of its fluid.

name: Skuntank
description: It sprays a stinky fluid from its tail. The fluid smells worse the longer it is allowed to fester.

name: Skuntank
description: It sprays a vile-smelling fluid from the tip of its tail to attack. Its range is over 160 feet.

name: Skuntank
description: It attacks by spraying a horribly smelly fluid from the tip of its tail. Attacks from above confound it.

name: Skuntank
description: It attacks by spraying a repugnant fluid from its tail, but the stench dulls after a few squirts.

name: Skuntank
description: It attacks by spraying a horribly smelly fluid from the tip of its tail. Attacks from above confound it.

description: It sprays a stinky fluid from its tail. The fluid smells worse the longer it is allowed to fester.

name: Skuntank
description: It sprays a vile-smelling fluid from the tip of its tail to attack. Its range is over 160 feet.

name: Bronzor
description: They are found in ancient tombs. The patterns on their backs are said to be imbued with mysterious power.

name: Bronzor
description: It appears in ancient ruins. The pattern on its body doesn't come from any culture in the Galar region, so it remains shrouded in mystery.

name: Bronzor
description: Ancient people believed that the pattern on Bronzor's back contained a mysterious power.

name: Bronzor
description: Implements shaped like it were discovered in ancient tombs. It is unknown if they are related.

name: Bronzor
description: There are researchers who believe this Pokemon reflected like a mirror in the distant past.

name: Bronzor
description: X-ray photos were taken to check its body structure. Nothing appeared, however.

name: Bronzor
description: Polishing Bronzor to a shine makes its surface reflect the truth, according to common lore. Be that as it may, Bronzor hates being polished.

name: Bronzor
description: Implements shaped like it were discovered in ancient tombs. It is unknown if they are related.

name: Bronzor
description: There are researchers who believe this Pokemon reflected like a mirror in the distant past.

name: Bronzor
description: Ancient people believed that the pattern on BRONZOR's back contained a mysterious power.

name: Bronzong
description: It brought rains by opening portals to another world. It was revered as a bringer of plentiful harvests.

name: Bronzong
description: Ancient people believed that petitioning Bronzong for rain was the way to make crops grow.

name: Bronzong
description: Ancient people believed that petitioning BRONZONG for rain was the way to make crops grow.

name: Bronzong
description: Many scientists suspect that this Pokemon originated outside the Galar region, based on the patterns on its body.

name: Bronzong
description: Some believe it to be a deity that summons rain clouds. When angered, it lets out a warning cry that rings out like the tolling of a bell.

name: Bronzong
description: It can summon rain clouds. People long ago revered it as the bringer of plentiful harvests.

name: Bronzong
description: It brought rains by opening portals to another world. It was revered as a bringer of plentiful harvests.

name: Bronzong
description: In ages past, this Pokemon was revered as a bringer of rain. It was found buried in the ground.

name: Bronzong
description: One caused a news sensation when it was dug up at a construction site after a 2,000-year sleep.

name: Bronzong
description: In ages past, this Pokemon was revered as a bringer of rain. It was found buried in the ground.

name: Bonsly
description: It looks as if it is always crying. It is actually adjusting its body's fluid levels by eliminating excess.

name: Bonsly
description: It prefers arid environments. It leaks water from its eyes to adjust its body's fluid levels.

name: Bonsly
description: It prefers an arid atmosphere. It leaks water that looks like tears when adjusting its moisture level.

name: Bonsly
description: This Pokemon lives in dry, rocky areas. As its green spheres dry out, their dull luster increases.

name: Bonsly
description: It prefers an arid atmosphere. It leaks water that looks like tears when adjusting its moisture level.

name: Bonsly

name: Bonsly
description: It prefers arid environments. It leaks water from its eyes to adjust its body's fluid levels.

name: Bonsly
description: It prefers an arid atmosphere. It leaks water that looks like tears when adjusting its moisture level.

name: Bonsly

name: Bonsly
description: From its eyes, it can expel excess moisture from its body. This liquid is similar in composition to human sweat.

name: Bonsly

name: Bonsly
description: In order to adjust the level of fluids in its body, it exudes water from its eyes. This makes it appear to be crying.

name: Bonsly
description: It discharges moisture from its eyes, making it look like it's crying--apparently an effective way of getting enemies to let down their guard.

name: Mime Jr.
description: It likes places where people gather. It mimics foes to confuse them, then makes its getaway.

name: Mime Jr.
description: It habitually mimics foes. Once mimicked, the foe cannot take its eyes off this Pokemon.

name: Mime Jr.
description: It does its absolute best to mimic the movements and expressions of its opponents, but it's still not very good at it.

name: Mime Jr.
description: It mimics the expressions and motions of those it sees to understand the feelings of others.

name: Mime Jr.
description: In an attempt to confuse its enemy, it mimics the enemy's movements. Then it wastes no time in making itself scarce!

name: Mime Jr.
description: It mimics the expressions and motions of those it sees to understand the feelings of others.

name: Mime Jr.
description: It looks for a Mr. Rime that's a good dancer and carefully copies the Mr. Rime's steps like an apprentice.

name: Mime Jr.
description: It mimics everyone it sees, but it puts extra effort into copying the graceful dance steps of Mr. Rime as practice.

name: Mime Jr.
description: When this gifted mimic surprises an opponent, Mime Jr. feels so happy that it ends up forgetting it was imitating something.

name: Mime Jr.
description: It habitually mimics foes. Once mimicked, the foe cannot take its eyes off this Pokemon.

name: Mime Jr.
description: In an attempt to confuse its enemy, it mimics the enemy's movements. Then it wastes no time in making itself scarce!

name: Happiny
description: It carries a round white rock in its belly pouch. If it gets along well with someone, it will sometimes give that person the rock.

name: Happiny
description: It carefully carries a round, white rock that it thinks is an egg. It's bothered by how curly its hair looks.

name: Happiny
description: It carries a round, egg-shaped rock in its belly pouch and gives the rock to its friends.

name: Happiny
description: It likes to carry around a small rock. It may wander around others' feet and cause them to stumble.

name: Happiny
description: Usually it's a well-behaved Pokemon, but if you take its round rock away, it will cry and fuss and throw a big old tantrum.

name: Happiny
description: When it sees something round and white, Happiny puts it into the pouch on its stomach. It sometimes becomes overloaded and can't move.

name: Happiny
description: Mimicking Chansey, Happiny will place an egg- shaped stone in its belly pouch. Happiny will treasure this stone.

name: Happiny
description: Happiny's willing to lend its precious round stone to those it's friendly with, but if the stone isn't returned, Happiny will cry and throw a tantrum.

name: Happiny
description: It carefully carries a round, white rock that it thinks is an egg. It's bothered by how curly its hair looks.

description: It likes to carry around a small rock. It may wander around others' feet and cause them to stumble.

description: It carries a round, egg-shaped rock in its belly pouch and gives the rock to its friends.

description: It loves round white things. It carries an egg-shaped rock in imitation of CHANSEY.

name: Happiny
description: It's too small to lay eggs yet. As a surrogate, it searches out round white stones.

name: Chatot
description: It can learn and speak human words. If they gather, they all learn the same saying.

name: Chatot
description: It mimics the cries of other Pokemon to trick them into thinking it's one of them. This way they won't attack it.

name: Chatot
description: Its tongue is just like a human's. As a result, it can cleverly mimic human speech.

name: Chatot
description: It mimics the cries of other Pokemon to trick them into thinking it's one of them. This way they won't attack it.

name: Chatot
description: Its tongue is just like a human's. As a result, it can cleverly mimic human speech.

name: Chatot
description: It keeps rhythm by flicking its tail feathers like a metronome. It imitates human speech.

name: Chatot
description: It can learn and speak human words. If they gather, they all learn the same saying.

name: Spiritomb
description: Its constant mischief and misdeeds resulted in it being bound to an Odd Keystone by a mysterious spell.

name: Spiritomb
description: It was formed by uniting 108 spirits. It has been bound to the Odd Keystone to keep it from doing any mischief.

name: Spiritomb
description: Its constant mischief and misdeeds resulted in it being bound to an Odd Keystone by a mysterious spell.

name: Spiritomb
description: A Pokemon that was formed by 108 spirits. It is bound to a fissure in an odd keystone.

name: Spiritomb
description: It was bound to a fissure in an odd keystone as punishment for misdeeds 500 years ago.

name: Spiritomb
description: Exactly 108 spirits gathered to become this Pokemon. Apparently there are some ill-natured spirits in the mix.

name: Spiritomb
description: All Spiritomb's mischief and misdeeds compelled a traveler to use a mysterious spell to bind Spiritomb to an odd keystone.

name: Spiritomb
description: It was bound to a fissure in an odd keystone as punishment for misdeeds 500 years ago.

name: Spiritomb
description: A Pokemon that was formed by 108 spirits. It is bound to a fissure in an odd keystone.

name: Gible
description: It lives in caves warmed by geothermal heat. Even so, when the weather gets cold, it will huddle close with others of its kind.

name: Gible
description: It nests in small, horizontal holes in cave walls. It pounces to catch prey that stray too close.

name: Gible
description: It once lived in the tropics. To avoid the cold, it lives in caves warmed by geothermal heat.

name: Gible
description: Gible attacks anything that moves, and it drags whatever it catches into the crevice that is its lair. Despite the big mouth, Gible's stomach is small.

name: Gible
description: Gible prefers to stay in narrow holes in the sides of caves heated by geothermal energy. This way, Gible can stay warm even during a blizzard.

name: Gible
description: It attacks using its huge mouth. While its attacks are powerful, it hurts itself out of clumsiness, too.

name: Gible
description: It nests in horizontal holes warmed by geothermal heat. Foes who get too close can expect to be pounced on and bitten.

name: Gible
description: It attacks using its huge mouth. While its attacks are powerful, it hurts itself out of clumsiness, too.

name: Gible
description: It nests in horizontal holes warmed by geothermal heat. Foes who get too close can expect to be pounced on and bitten.

name: Gible
description: It reacts to anything that moves--flies right at it and bites it. Sometimes it injures itself, but it doesn't care too much.

name: Gible
description: It skulks in caves, and when prey or an enemy passes by, it leaps out and chomps them. The force of its attack sometimes chips its teeth.

name: Gible
description: It nests in small, horizontal holes in cave walls. It pounces to catch prey that stray too close.

name: Gible
description: Its original home is an area much hotter than Alola. If you're planning to live with one, your heating bill will soar.

name: Gabite
description: It sheds its skin and gradually grows larger. Its scales can be ground into a powder and used as raw materials for traditional medicine.

name: Gabite
description: Shiny objects are its passion. It can be found in its cave, scarcely moving, its gaze fixed on the jewels it's amassed or Carbink it has caught.

name: Gabite
description: Jewels are buried in the caves these Pokemon nest in, but you'll be torn apart by claws and fangs the moment you enter one of these caves.

name: Gabite
description: This Pokemon emits ultrasonic waves from a protrusion on either side of its head to probe pitch-dark caves.

name: Gabite
description: It loves shiny things. When it finds a Sableye trying to catch a Carbink, Gabite becomes furiously angry and attacks the Sableye.

name: Gabite
description: In rare cases, it molts and sheds its scales. Medicine containing its scales as an ingredient will make a weary body feel invigorated.

name: Gabite
description: As it digs to expand its nest, it habitually digs up gems that it then hoards in its nest.

name: Gabite
description: It loves sparkly things. It seeks treasures in caves and hoards the loot in its nest.

name: Gabite
description: It loves sparkly things. It seeks treasures in caves and hoards the loot in its nest.

name: Gabite
description: As it digs to expand its nest, it habitually digs up gems that it then hoards in its nest.

name: Gabite
description: It habitually digs up and hoards gems in its nest. Its loot is constantly targeted by thieves.

name: Gabite
description: It loves sparkly things. It seeks treasures in caves and hoards the loot in its nest.

name: Gabite
description: There is a long-held belief that medicine made from its scales will heal even incurable illnesses.

name: Garchomp
description: It can fly at speeds rivaling jet planes. It dives into flocks of bird Pokemon and gulps the entire flock down whole.

name: Garchomp
description: When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.

name: Garchomp
description: It flies at speeds equal to a jet fighter plane. It never allows its prey to escape.

name: Garchomp
description: It is said that when one runs at high speed, its wings create blades of wind that can fell nearby trees.

name: Garchomp
description: Its body is covered in fine scales that reduce drag, enabling it to fly at high speeds.

name: Garchomp
description: Garchomp makes its home in volcanic mountains. It flies through the sky as fast as a jet airplane, hunting down as much prey as it can.

name: Garchomp
description: It flies at the speed of sound while searching for prey, and it has midair battles with Salamence as the two compete for food.

name: Garchomp
description: Its fine scales don't just reduce wind resistance--their sharp edges also cause injury to any opponent who attacks it.

name: Garchomp
description: Garchomp is fast both underground and above. It can bring down prey and return to its den before its body has chilled from being outside.

name: Garchomp
description: It is said that when one runs at high speed, its wings create blades of wind that can fell nearby trees.

name: Garchomp
description: When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.

name: Garchomp
description: It flies at speeds equal to a jet fighter plane. It never allows its prey to escape.

name: Garchomp
description: The protuberances on its head serve as sensors. It can even detect distant prey.

name: Munchlax
description: In its desperation to gulp down food, it forgets about the food it has hidden under its fur.

name: Munchlax
description: In its desperation to gulp down food, it forgets about the food it has hidden under its fur.

name: Munchlax
description: It hides food under its long body hair. However, it forgets it has hidden the food.

name: Munchlax
description: It conceals food under the long fur on its body. It carts around this food stash and swallows it without chewing.

name: Munchlax
description: It hides food under its long body hair. However, it forgets it has hidden the food.

name: Munchlax
description: It wolfs down its weight in food once a day, swallowing food whole with almost no chewing.

name: Munchlax
description: It conceals food under the long fur on its body. It carts around this food stash and swallows it without chewing.

name: Munchlax
description: When it finds something that looks like it might be edible, it goes right ahead and swallows it whole. That's why it gets fatter day by day.

name: Munchlax
description: It needs to consume its own weight in food every day. As far as flavor is concerned, it's indifferent.

name: Munchlax
description: Anything that looks edible, Munchlax will go on and swallow whole. Its stomach is tough enough to handle it even if the food has gone rotten.

name: Munchlax
description: Stuffing itself with vast amounts of food is its only concern. Whether the food is rotten or fresh, yummy or tasteless--it does not care.

name: Munchlax
description: It stores food beneath its fur. It might share just one bite, but only if it really trusts you.

name: Munchlax
description: It hides food under its long fur, but it sometimes forgets about it and causes a stinky disturbance.

name: Riolu
description: The aura that emanates from its body intensifies to alert others if it is afraid or sad.

name: Riolu
description: It's tough enough to run right through the night, and it's also a hard worker, but it's still just a youngster.

name: Riolu
description: It knows how people and Pokemon feel by looking at their auras. It doesn't approach dangerous opponents.

name: Riolu
description: It uses waves called auras to communicate with others of its kind. It doesn't make any noise during this time, so its enemies can't detect it.

name: Riolu
description: It's exceedingly energetic, with enough stamina to keep running all through the night. Taking it for walks can be a challenging experience.

name: Riolu
description: It can use waves called auras to gauge how others are feeling. These same waves can also tell this Pokemon about the state of the environment.

name: Riolu
description: It can discern the physical and emotional states of people, Pokemon, and other natural things from the shape of their aura waves.

name: Riolu
description: It uses the shapes of auras, which change according to emotion, to communicate with others.

name: Riolu
description: The aura that emanates from its body intensifies to alert others if it is afraid or sad.

name: Riolu
description: It has the peculiar power of being able to see emotions such as joy and rage in the form of waves.

name: Riolu
description: They communicate with one another using their auras. They are able to run all through the night.

name: Riolu
description: It has the peculiar power of being able to see emotions such as joy and rage in the form of waves.

name: Riolu
description: Its body is lithe yet powerful. It can crest three mountains and cross two canyons in one night.

name: Riolu
description: It uses the shapes of auras, which change according to emotion, to communicate with others.

name: Lucario
description: It's said that no foe can remain invisible to LUCARIO, since it can detect auras. Even foes it could not otherwise see.

name: Lucario
description: A well-trained one can sense auras to identify and take in the feelings of creatures over half a mile away.

name: Lucario
description: By reading the auras of all things, it can tell how others are feeling from over half a mile away.

name: Lucario
description: By catching the aura emanating from others, it can read their thoughts and movements.

name: Lucario
description: By reading the auras of all things, it can tell how others are feeling from over half a mile away.

name: Lucario
description: They can detect the species of a living being-- and its emotions--from over half a mile away. They control auras and hunt their prey in packs.

name: Lucario
description: Not only does it perceive auras, but it has also gained the power to control them. It employs them in battle.

name: Lucario
description: Lucario reads its opponent's feelings with its aura waves. It finds out things it would rather not know, so it gets stressed out easily.

name: Lucario
description: It controls waves known as auras, which are powerful enough to pulverize huge rocks. It uses these waves to take down its prey.

name: Lucario
description: It can tell what people are thinking. Only Trainers who have justice in their hearts can earn this Pokemon's trust.

name: Lucario
description: A well-trained one can sense auras to identify and take in the feelings of creatures over half a mile away.

name: Lucario
description: By catching the aura emanating from others, it can read their thoughts and movements.

name: Lucario
description: It has the ability to sense the auras of all things. It understands human speech.

name: Lucario
description: It concentrates its mental energy and fires off mysterious waves called auras, which can crush boulders of large size to dust.

name: Hippopotas
description: It lives in arid places. Instead of perspiration, it expels grainy sand from its body.

name: Hippopotas
description: It enshrouds itself with sand to protect itself from germs. It does not enjoy getting wet.

name: Hippopotas
description: It shuts its nostrils tight then travels through sand as if walking. They form colonies of around ten.

name: Hippopotas
description: It shrouds itself in sand to ward off germs. It travels easily through the sands of the desert.

name: Hippopotas
description: It shuts its nostrils tight then travels through sand as if walking. They form colonies of around ten.

description: It shuts its nostrils tight then travels through sand as if walking. They form colonies of around 10.

name: Hippopotas
description: It enshrouds itself with sand to protect itself from germs. It does not enjoy getting wet.

name: Hippopotas
description: It moves through the sands with its mouth open, swallowing sand along with its prey. It gets rid of the sand by spouting it from its nose.

name: Hippopotas
description: It lives in arid places. Instead of perspiration, it expels grainy sand from its body.

name: Hippopotas
description: This Pokemon is active during the day and passes the cold desert nights burrowed snugly into the sand.

name: Hippowdon
description: It blasts internally stored sand from ports on its body to create a towering twister for attack.

name: Hippowdon
description: It brandishes its gaping mouth in a display of fearsome strength. It raises vast quantities of sand while attacking.

name: Hippowdon
description: It is surprisingly quick to anger. It holds its mouth agape as a display of its strength.

name: Hippowdon
description: It brandishes its gaping mouth in a display of fearsome strength. It raises vast quantities of sand while attacking.

name: Hippowdon
description: It is surprisingly quick to anger. It holds its mouth agape as a display of its strength.

name: Hippowdon
description: Its huge mouth is almost seven feet across. It has enough power to completely crush a car.

name: Hippowdon
description: It blasts internally stored sand from ports on its body to create a towering twister for attack.

name: Hippowdon
description: When roused to violence by its rage, it spews out the quantities of sand it has swallowed and whips up a sandstorm.

name: Hippowdon
description: Stones can get stuck in the ports on their bodies. Dwebble help dislodge such stones, so Hippowdon look after these Pokemon.

name: Skorupi

name: Swadloon
description: It protects itself from the cold by wrapping up in leaves. It stays on the move, eating leaves in forests.

name: Leavanny
