name: Scolipede

name: Scolipede

name: Cottonee

name: Cottonee
description: Perhaps because they feel more at ease in a group, they stick to others they find. They end up looking like a cloud.

name: Whimsicott

name: Whimsicott

name: Whimsicott

name: Petilil

name: Petilil

name: Lilligant

description: It needs a running start to take off. If Archeops wants to fly, it first needs to run nearly 25 mph, building speed over a course of about 2.5 miles.

name: Archeops
description: Said to be an ancestor of bird Pokemon, the muscles it uses to flap its wings are still weak, so it needs a long runway in order to take off.

name: Archeops
description: They are intelligent and will cooperate to catch prey. From the ground, they use a running start to take flight.

name: Archeops
description: Though capable of flight, Archeops was apparently better at hunting on the ground.

name: Archeops
description: Although apparently able to fly, they tended to run along the ground, averaging speeds of roughly 25 mph.

name: Trubbish
description: The combination of garbage bags and industrial waste caused the chemical reaction that created this Pokemon.

name: Trubbish
description: Poisonous gas leaks out of it when it breathes. Muk that catch a whiff of that stench will come drooling.

name: Trubbish
description: The combination of garbage bags and industrial waste caused the chemical reaction that created this Pokemon.

name: Trubbish
description: If a young Pokemon or child breathes in the toxic gas that Trubbish belches out, it could be a life-threatening situation.

name: Trubbish
description: Inhaling the gas they belch will make you sleep for a week. They prefer unsanitary places.

name: Trubbish
description: Wanting more garbage, they follow people who litter. They always belch poison gas.

name: Trubbish
description: Its favorite places are unsanitary ones. If you leave trash lying around, you could even find one of these Pokemon living in your room.

name: Trubbish
description: This Pokemon was born from a bag stuffed with trash. Galarian Weezing relish the fumes belched by Trubbish.

name: Trubbish
description: It gorges on trash until its stomach is full. Then it belches toxic gas. An unlucky whiff of gas will put a person in the hospital.

name: Trubbish
description: Unsanitary places are what they like best. They can be spotted in Alola, often with Grimer in hot pursuit.

name: Trubbish
description: Inhaling the gas they belch will make you sleep for a week. They prefer unsanitary places.

name: Garbodor
description: Some say the reason Garbodor in Alola are a little stronger than their counterparts elsewhere is the presence of Muk, their natural enemy.

name: Garbodor
description: Consuming garbage makes new kinds of poison gases and liquids inside their bodies.

name: Garbodor
description: It clenches opponents with its left arm and finishes them off with foul-smelling poison gas belched from its mouth.

name: Garbodor
description: They absorb garbage and make it part of their bodies. They shoot a poisonous liquid from their right-hand fingertips.

name: Garbodor
description: The toxic liquid it launches from its right arm is so virulent that it can kill a weakened creature instantly.

name: Garbodor
description: This Pokemon eats trash, which turns into poison inside its body. The main component of the poison depends on what sort of trash was eaten.

name: Garbodor
description: It locks opponents in place with its left hand, immobilizing them by entirely dousing their bodies with poisonous liquid.

name: Garbodor
description: For a time, their numbers increased explosively in Alola. Since the arrival of Grimer, their population has decreased dramatically.

name: Garbodor
description: Beware the poisonous liquid it shoots from its right arm. If even a little of it gets on you, you'll experience the effects of the unidentified toxin.

name: Garbodor
description: It clenches opponents with its left arm and finishes them off with foul-smelling poison gas belched from its mouth.

name: Garbodor
description: Consuming garbage makes new kinds of poison gases and liquids inside their bodies.

name: Zorua
description: It changes so it looks just like its foe, tricks it, and then uses that opportunity to flee.

name: Zorua
description: This Pokemon has a cowardly disposition, so when it's not around friends, it basically always stays transformed as something else.

name: Zorua
description: If a normally talkative child suddenly stops talking, it may have been replaced by Zorua.

name: Zorua
description: Zorua is a timid Pokemon. This disposition seems to be what led to the development of Zorua's ability to take on the forms of other creatures.

name: Zorua
description: To protect themselves from danger, they hide their true identities by transforming into people and Pokemon.

name: Zorua
description: It changes into the forms of others to surprise them. Apparently, it often transforms into a silent child.

name: Zorua
description: Zorua sometimes transforms into a person and goes into cities to search for food. When Zorua does this, it usually takes on the form of a child.

name: Zorua
description: It changes so it looks just like its foe, tricks it, and then uses that opportunity to flee.

name: Zorua
description: To protect themselves from danger, they hide their true identities by transforming into people and Pokemon.

name: Zoroark
description: If it thinks humans are going to discover its den, Zoroark shows them visions that make them wander around in the woods.

name: Zoroark
description: Each has the ability to fool a large group of people simultaneously. They protect their lair with illusory scenery.

name: Zoroark
description: Stories say those who tried to catch Zoroark were trapped in an illusion and punished.

name: Zoroark
description: Each has the ability to fool a large group of people simultaneously. They protect their lair with illusory scenery.

name: Zoroark
description: Bonds between these Pokemon are very strong. It protects the safety of its pack by tricking its opponents.

name: Zoroark
description: This Pokemon cares deeply about others of its kind, and it will conjure terrifying illusions to keep its den and pack safe.

name: Zoroark
description: Seeking to ease the burden of their solitude, lonely Trainers tell Zoroark to show illusions to them.

name: Zoroark
description: Bonds between these Pokemon are very strong. It protects the safety of its pack by tricking its opponents.

name: Zoroark
description: It doesn't just transform itself--it also has the power to make hundreds of people see its illusions.

name: Minccino
description: Minccino greet each other by grooming one another thoroughly with their tails.

name: Minccino

name: Minccino
description: When its tail has gotten dirty from self-cleaning or from cleaning its nest, Minccino spends a whole day washing its tail in clean spring water.

name: Minccino
description: A clean freak that will not allow even the slightest mess, it uses its tail like a mop to thoroughly clean any and all filth.

name: Minccino
description: They greet one another by rubbing each other with their tails, which are always kept well groomed and clean.

name: Minccino
description: These Pokemon prefer a tidy habitat. They are always sweeping and dusting, using their tails as brooms.

name: Minccino
description: These Pokemon prefer a tidy habitat. They are always sweeping and dusting, using their tails as brooms.

name: Minccino
description: Minccino greet each other by grooming one another thoroughly with their tails.

name: Minccino
description: They pet each other with their tails as a form of greeting. Of the two, the one whose tail is fluffier is a bit more boastful.

name: Cinccino
description: A special oil that seeps through their fur helps them avoid attacks. The oil fetches a high price at market.

name: Cinccino
description: Its body secretes oil that this Pokemon spreads over its nest as a coating to protect it from dust. Cinccino won't tolerate even a speck of the stuff.

name: Cinccino
description: The oil that seeps from its body is really smooth. For people troubled by bad skin, this oil is an effective treatment.

name: Cinccino
description: Their white fur is coated in a special oil that makes it easy for them to deflect attacks.

name: Cinccino
description: Cinccino's body is coated in a special oil that helps it deflect attacks, such as punches.

name: Cinccino
description: Their white fur feels amazing to touch. Their fur repels dust and prevents static electricity from building up.

name: Cinccino
description: Their white fur feels amazing to touch. Their fur repels dust and prevents static electricity from building up.

name: Cinccino
description: Cinccino's body is coated in a special oil that helps it deflect attacks, such as punches.

name: Cinccino
description: The white parts of its coat are covered in an oil secreted from its body, so this Pokemon can slide right away from its enemies' attacks.

name: Gothita
description: Their ribbonlike feelers increase their psychic power. They are always staring at something.

name: Gothita
description: Though they're still only babies, there's psychic power stored in their ribbonlike feelers, and sometimes they use that power to fight.

name: Gothita
description: They intently observe both Trainers and Pokemon. Apparently, they are looking at something that only Gothita can see.

name: Gothita
description: It stares intently at everything. It can become so obsessed with watching that it doesn't notice attacks.

name: Gothita
description: Even when nobody seems to be around, Gothita can still be heard making a muted cry. Many believe it's speaking to something only it can see.

name: Gothita
description: Their ribbonlike feelers increase their psychic power. They are always staring at something.

name: Gothita
description: They intently observe both Trainers and Pokemon. Apparently, they are looking at something that only Gothita can see.

name: Gothorita
description: Starlight is the source of their power. At night, they mark star positions by using psychic power to float stones.

name: Gothorita
description: According to many old tales, it creates friends for itself by controlling sleeping children on starry nights.

name: Gothorita
description: Starlight is the source of their power. At night, they mark star positions by using psychic power to float stones.

name: Gothorita
description: They use hypnosis to control people and Pokemon. Tales of Gothorita leading people astray are told in every corner.

name: Gothorita
description: According to many old tales, it creates friends for itself by controlling sleeping children on starry nights.

name: Gothorita
description: On nights when the stars shine, this Pokemon's psychic power is at its strongest. It's unknown just what link Gothorita has to the greater universe.

name: Gothorita
description: It's said that when stars shine in the night sky, this Pokemon will spirit away sleeping children. Some call it the Witch of Punishment.

name: Gothitelle
description: Starry skies thousands of light-years away are visible in the space distorted by their intense psychic power.

name: Gothitelle
description: It has tremendous psychic power, but it dislikes conflict. It's also able to predict the future based on the movement of the stars.

name: Gothitelle
description: They can predict the future from the placement and movement of the stars. They can see Trainers' life spans.

name: Gothitelle
description: It can see the future from the movement of the stars. When it learns its Trainer's life span, it cries in sadness.

name: Gothitelle
description: They can predict the future from the placement and movement of the stars. They can see Trainers' life spans.

name: Gothitelle
description: Starry skies thousands of light-years away are visible in the space distorted by their intense psychic power.

name: Gothitelle
description: A criminal who was shown his fate by a Gothitelle went missing that same day and was never seen again.

name: Solosis
description: Because their bodies are enveloped in a special liquid, they can survive in any environment.

name: Solosis
description: Because their bodies are enveloped in a special liquid, they are fine in any environment, no matter how severe.

name: Solosis
description: Because their bodies are enveloped in a special liquid, they are fine in any environment, no matter how severe.

description: They drive away attackers by unleashing psychic power. They can use telepathy to talk with others.

name: Solosis
description: It communicates with others telepathically. Its body is encapsulated in liquid, but if it takes a heavy blow, the liquid will leak out.

name: Solosis

name: Solosis
description: They drive away attackers by unleashing psychic power. They can use telepathy to talk with others.

name: Duosion

name: Duosion
description: Since they have two divided brains, at times they suddenly try to take two different actions at once.

name: Duosion
description: When their brains, now divided in two, are thinking the same thoughts, these Pokemon exhibit their maximum power.

name: Duosion
description: When their two divided brains think the same thoughts, their psychic power is maximized.

name: Duosion
description: Since they have two divided brains, at times they suddenly try to take two different actions at once.

name: Duosion
description: When their two divided brains think the same thoughts, their psychic power is maximized.

name: Duosion

name: Reuniclus

name: Reuniclus
description: While it could use its psychic abilities in battle, this Pokemon prefers to swing its powerful arms around to beat opponents into submission.

name: Reuniclus
description: When Reuniclus shake hands, a network forms between their brains, increasing their psychic power.

name: Reuniclus
description: They use psychic power to control their arms, which are made of a special liquid. They can crush boulders psychically.

name: Reuniclus
description: These remarkably intelligent Pokemon fight by controlling arms that can grip with rock-crushing power.

name: Reuniclus
description: When Reuniclus shake hands, a network forms between their brains, increasing their psychic power.

name: Reuniclus
description: They use psychic power to control their arms, which are made of a special liquid. They can crush boulders psychically.

name: Ducklett

name: Ducklett
description: When attacked, it uses its feathers to splash water, escaping under cover of the spray.

name: Ducklett
description: They are better at swimming than flying, and they happily eat their favorite food, peat moss, as they dive underwater.

name: Ducklett
description: When attacked, it uses its feathers to splash water, escaping under cover of the spray.

name: Ducklett
description: They are better at swimming than flying, and they happily eat their favorite food, peat moss, as they dive underwater.

name: Swanna

name: Swanna
description: Despite their elegant appearance, they can flap their wings strongly and fly for thousands of miles.

name: Swanna
description: Despite their elegant appearance, they can flap their wings strongly and fly for thousands of miles.

name: Swanna
description: It administers sharp, powerful pecks with its bill. It whips its long neck to deliver forceful repeated strikes.

name: Swanna
description: Swanna start to dance at dusk. The one dancing in the middle is the leader of the flock.

name: Vanillite
description: This Pokemon formed from icicles bathed in energy from the morning sun. It sleeps buried in snow.

name: Vanillite
description: It feels pleasantly cool when embraced. This Pokemon is treasured by households in warm regions.

name: Vanillite
description: It exhales cold air that is at -58 degrees Fahrenheit. When it's in a warm place, it shrinks little by little.

name: Vanillite
description: Theoretically, this Pokemon formed from icicles bathed in energy from the morning sun. Their breath is -58deg F.

name: Vanillite
description: This Pokemon formed from icicles bathed in energy from the morning sun. It sleeps buried in snow.

name: Vanillite
description: The temperature of their breath is -58deg F. They create snow crystals and make snow fall in the areas around them.

name: Vanillite
description: Unable to survive in hot areas, it makes itself comfortable by breathing out air cold enough to cause snow. It burrows into the snow to sleep.

name: Vanillite
description: The temperature of their breath is -58 degrees Fahrenheit. They create snow crystals and make snow fall in the areas around them.

name: Vanillite

name: Vanillite
description: When the morning sun hit an icicle, it wished not to melt, and thus Vanillite was born. At night, it buries itself in snow to sleep.

name: Vanillite
description: Born of an icicle, this Pokemon uses its frosty breath to make ice crystals, causing snow to fall.

name: Vanillish
description: It conceals itself from enemy eyes by creating many small ice particles and hiding among them.

name: Vanillish
description: They cool down the surrounding air and create ice particles, which they use to freeze their foes.

name: Vanillish
description: Snowy mountains are this Pokemon's habitat. During an ancient ice age, they moved to southern areas.

name: Vanillish
description: Snowy mountains are this Pokemon's habitat. During an ancient ice age, they moved to southern areas.

name: Vanillish
description: Hot days cause its body to melt. It can be restored by refreezing it, but the process leaves its body slightly warped.

name: Vanillish
description: This Pokemon has existed since the Ice Age. It controls particles of ice, freezes its opponents, and then shatters them with a headbutt.

name: Vanillish
description: It sprays its enemies with grains of ice to freeze them. Most Vanillish in Alola are smaller than average.

name: Vanillish
description: This hearty Pokemon survived the Ice Age. It's incredibly popular in very hot regions.

name: Vanillish
description: By drinking pure water, it grows its icy body. This Pokemon can be hard to find on days with warm, sunny weather.

name: Vanillish
description: It blasts enemies with cold air reaching -148 degrees Fahrenheit, freezing them solid. But it spares their lives afterward--it's a kind Pokemon.

name: Vanillish
description: They cool down the surrounding air and create ice particles, which they use to freeze their foes.

name: Vanilluxe
description: Even if it loses one of its heads, it can live relatively problem-free. It makes snow clouds inside its body.

name: Vanilluxe
description: If both heads get angry simultaneously, this Pokemon expels a blizzard, burying everything in snow.

name: Vanilluxe
description: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and, when angry, cause violent blizzards.

name: Vanilluxe

name: Vanilluxe
description: When its anger reaches a breaking point, this Pokemon unleashes a fierce blizzard that freezes every creature around it, be they friend or foe.

name: Vanilluxe

name: Vanilluxe

name: Vanilluxe
description: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and attack their foes with violent blizzards.

name: Vanilluxe

name: Vanilluxe
description: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and, when angry, cause violent blizzards.

name: Vanilluxe
description: If both heads get angry simultaneously, this Pokemon expels a blizzard, burying everything in snow.

name: Deerling
description: The color and scent of their fur changes to match the mountain grass. When they sense hostility, they hide in the grass.

name: Deerling

name: Deerling
description: The turning of the seasons changes the color and scent of this Pokemon's fur. People use it to mark the seasons.

name: Deerling

name: Deerling
description: Their coloring changes according to the seasons and can be slightly affected by the temperature and humidity as well.

name: Sawsbuck
description: They migrate according to the seasons. People can tell the season by looking at Sawsbuck's horns.

name: Sawsbuck
description: They migrate according to the seasons, so some people call Sawsbuck the harbingers of spring.

name: Sawsbuck
description: They migrate according to the seasons. People can tell the season by looking at Sawsbuck's horns.

name: Emolga
description: The energy made in its cheeks' electric pouches is stored inside its membrane and released while it is gliding.

name: Emolga
description: It glides using its cape-like membrane. Electrical energy scatters from it, shocking its friends and foes alike.

name: Emolga
description: They store up electricity to fly through the air. When thunder cracks at night, sometimes there are almost enough of them to blot out the sky.

name: Emolga
description: As it flies, it scatters electricity around, so bird Pokemon keep their distance. That's why Emolga can keep all its food to itself.

name: Emolga
description: As Emolga flutters through the air, it crackles with electricity. This Pokemon is cute, but it can cause a lot of trouble.

name: Emolga
description: This Pokemon absolutely loves sweet berries. Sometimes it stuffs its cheeks full of so much food that it can't fly properly.

name: Emolga
description: They live on treetops and glide using the inside of a cape-like membrane while discharging electricity.

name: Emolga
description: It glides on its outstretched membrane while shocking foes with the electricity stored in the pouches on its cheeks.

name: Emolga
description: It grills berries and bug Pokemon with electric shocks and makes a meal of them. It usually nests in the holes gouged in trees by Pikipek.

name: Emolga
description: The energy made in its cheeks' electric pouches is stored inside its membrane and released while it is gliding.

name: Emolga

name: Karrablast
description: For some reason they evolve when they receive electrical energy while they are attacking Shelmet.

name: Karrablast
description: These mysterious Pokemon evolve when they receive electrical stimulation while they are in the same place as Shelmet.

name: Karrablast
description: For some reason they evolve when they receive electrical energy while they are attacking Shelmet.

name: Karrablast
description: Its strange physiology reacts to electrical energy in interesting ways. The presence of a Shelmet will cause this Pokemon to evolve.

name: Karrablast
description: It spits a liquid from its mouth to melt through Shelmet's shell. Karrablast doesn't eat the shell-- it eats only the contents.

name: Karrablast
description: These mysterious Pokemon evolve when they receive electrical stimulation while they are in the same place as Shelmet.

name: Escavalier

name: Escavalier
description: They use shells they've stolen from Shelmet to arm and protect themselves. They're very popular Pokemon in the Galar region.

name: Escavalier
description: Wearing the shell covering they stole from Shelmet, they defend themselves and attack with two lances.

name: Escavalier
description: These Pokemon evolve by wearing the shell covering of a Shelmet. The steel armor protects their whole body.

name: Escavalier
description: These Pokemon evolve by wearing the shell covering of a Shelmet. The steel armor protects their whole body.

name: Escavalier
description: They fly around at high speed, striking with their pointed spears. Even when in trouble, they face opponents bravely.

name: Escavalier
description: Wearing the shell covering they stole from Shelmet, they defend themselves and attack with two lances.

name: Foongus

name: Foongus
description: The spores released from this Pokemon's hands are highly poisonous, but when thoroughly dried, the spores can be used as stomach medicine.

name: Foongus

name: Foongus
description: It lures Pokemon with its pattern that looks just like a Poke Ball, then releases poison spores.

name: Amoonguss
description: They show off their Poke Ball caps to lure prey, but very few Pokemon are fooled by this.

name: Amoonguss
description: It moves the caps on both arms and does a dance to lure prey. It prefers damp places.

name: Amoonguss
description: Amoonguss generally doesn't move much. It tends to stand still near Poke Balls that have been dropped on the ground.

name: Amoonguss
description: This Pokemon puffs poisonous spores at its foes. If the spores aren't washed off quickly, they'll grow into mushrooms wherever they land.

name: Frillish

name: Frillish
description: They paralyze prey with poison, then drag them down to their lairs, five miles below the surface.

name: Frillish
description: With its thin, veil-like arms wrapped around the body of its opponent, it sinks to the ocean floor.

name: Frillish
description: Using the invisible poison spikes on its veillike arms and legs, it paralyzes its enemies and causes them to drown.

name: Frillish
description: If its veil-like arms stun and wrap a foe, that foe will be dragged miles below the surface, never to return.

name: Jellicent

name: Jellicent
description: Jellicent is always hanging around fancy cruise ships and tankers, hoping to drag away its prey.

name: Jellicent
description: The fate of the ships and crew that wander into Jellicent's habitat: all sunken, all lost, all vanished.

name: Jellicent
description: Its body is mostly seawater. It's said there's a castle of ships Jellicent have sunk on the seafloor.

name: Jellicent
description: They propel themselves by expelling absorbed seawater from their bodies. Their favorite food is life energy.

name: Jellicent

name: Alomomola
description: The reason it helps Pokemon in a weakened condition is that any Pokemon coming after them may also attack Alomomola.

name: Alomomola
description: It gently holds injured and weak Pokemon in its fins. Its special membrane heals their wounds.

name: Alomomola
description: They float upon the open sea. Many water Pokemon gather in the area around Alomomola.

name: Alomomola
description: It uses its special mucus to close the wounds of injured Pokemon. The reason for this behavior remains unknown.

name: Alomomola
description: Floating in the open sea is how they live. When they find a wounded Pokemon, they embrace it and bring it to shore.

name: Alomomola
description: It gently holds injured and weak Pokemon in its fins. Its special membrane heals their wounds.

name: Alomomola
description: Floating in the open sea is how they live. When they find a wounded Pokemon, they embrace it and bring it to shore.

name: Alomomola

name: Alomomola
description: Fishermen take them along on long voyages, because if you have an Alomomola with you, there'll be no need for a doctor or medicine.

name: Joltik
description: Joltik that live in cities have learned a technique for sucking electricity from the outlets in houses.

name: Joltik
description: Joltik can be found clinging to other Pokemon. It's soaking up static electricity because it can't produce a charge on its own.

name: Joltik
description: They attach themselves to large-bodied Pokemon and absorb static electricity, which they store in an electric pouch.

name: Joltik

description: They attach themselves to large-bodied Pokemon and absorb static electricity, which they store in an electric pouch.

name: Galvantula

name: Galvantula

name: Galvantula

name: Galvantula

name: Galvantula

description: With its powerful legs and sturdy claws, it can crack even the hard shells of Shellder and pluck out their insides.

name: Rufflet
description: Known as a natural-born warrior, soon after its hatching, it will challenge its parent to a fight in order to gain their acceptance.

name: Rufflet
description: If it spies a strong Pokemon, Rufflet can't resist challenging it to a battle. But if Rufflet loses, it starts bawling.

name: Rufflet
description: They will challenge anything, even strong opponents, without fear. Their frequent fights help them become stronger.

name: Rufflet
description: They crush berries with their talons. They bravely stand up to any opponent, no matter how strong it is.

name: Rufflet
description: They crush berries with their talons. They bravely stand up to any opponent, no matter how strong it is.

name: Braviary
description: Because this Pokemon is hotheaded and belligerent, it's Corviknight that's taken the role of transportation in Galar.

name: Braviary
description: They fight for their friends without any thought about danger to themselves. One can carry a car while flying.

name: Braviary
description: The more scars they have, the more respect these brave soldiers of the sky get from their peers.

name: Braviary
description: For the sake of its friends, this brave warrior of the sky will not stop battling, even if injured.

name: Braviary
description: For the sake of its friends, this brave warrior of the sky will not stop battling, even if injured.

name: Braviary
description: With its brave disposition, it fears nothing--not even death. Ancient Alolan people respected it, referring to it as "the hero of the sky."

name: Braviary
description: They fight for their friends without any thought about danger to themselves. One can carry a car while flying.

name: Braviary
description: Known as "the hero of the skies," this Pokemon is so proud and so brave that it will never retreat, even when it's injured.

name: Braviary
description: It's thought that people disturbed their habitats in the past, so Braviary banded together to fight back.

name: Braviary
description: The more scars it has on its front, the more heroic it's considered to be. Those with many scars on their back are mocked by the flock.

name: Braviary
description: Known for its bravery and pride, this majestic Pokemon is often seen as a motif for various kinds of emblems.

name: Vullaby
description: It wears a bone to protect its rear. It often squabbles with others of its kind over particularly comfy bones.

name: Vullaby
description: Its healthy appetite leads to visible growth spurts. It often has to replace the bones it wears as its size increases.

name: Vullaby
description: Mandibuzz gives it the bones it wears. Vullaby's wings are short, so it can't fly yet, but it jumps around, dreaming of wide open skies.

name: Vullaby
description: It can't fly yet and must wait until its wings have developed more. Since it's still at a playful age, it hops around friskily.

name: Vullaby
description: Their wings are too tiny to allow them to fly. They guard their posteriors with bones that were gathered by Mandibuzz.

name: Vullaby
description: Vullaby grow quickly. Bones that have gotten too small for older Vullaby to wear often get passed down to younger ones in the nest.

name: Vullaby
description: They tend to guard their posteriors with suitable bones they have found. They pursue weak Pokemon.

name: Vullaby
description: It protects its plump posterior with the bones of prey it has consumed. As it grows, it replaces the bones.

name: Vullaby
description: Their wings are too tiny to allow them to fly. They guard their posteriors with bones that were gathered by Mandibuzz.

name: Vullaby
description: Its wings are too tiny to allow it to fly. As the time approaches for it to evolve, it discards the bones it was wearing.

name: Vullaby
description: Its wings are too tiny to allow it to fly. As the time approaches for it to evolve, it discards the bones it was wearing.

name: Mandibuzz
description: They fly in circles around the sky. When they spot prey, they attack and carry it back to their nest with ease.

name: Mandibuzz
description: Watching from the sky, they swoop to strike weakened Pokemon on the ground. They decorate themselves with bones.

name: Mandibuzz
description: They adorn themselves beautifully with bones. This is supposedly an effort to attract males, but no male Mandibuzz have ever been found.

name: Mandibuzz
description: It's always searching for food for Vullaby. When it finds a weak Pokemon, Mandibuzz swoops it right off to its nest.

name: Mandibuzz
description: It skillfully arranges the bones of its prey to construct its nest. Most of the bones are Cubone.

name: Mandibuzz
description: Although it's a bit of a ruffian, this Pokemon will take lost Vullaby under its wing and care for them till they're ready to leave the nest.

name: Mandibuzz
description: They adorn themselves with bones. There seem to be fashion trends among them, as different bones come into and fall out of popularity.

name: Mandibuzz
description: It circles in the sky, keeping a keen eye out for Pokemon in a weakened state. Its choicest food is Cubone.

name: Mandibuzz
description: They fly in circles around the sky. When they spot prey, they attack and carry it back to their nest with ease.

name: Mandibuzz
description: Watching from the sky, they swoop to strike weakened Pokemon on the ground. They decorate themselves with bones.

name: Mandibuzz
description: It makes a nest out of bones it finds. It grabs weakened prey in its talons and hauls it to its nest of bones.

name: Heatmor
description: It breathes through a hole in its tail while it burns with an internal fire. Durant is its prey.

name: Heatmor
description: Using their very hot, flame-covered tongues, they burn through Durant's steel bodies and consume their insides.

name: Heatmor
description: It draws in air through its tail, transforms it into fire, and uses it like a tongue. It melts Durant and eats them.

name: Heatmor
description: Using their very hot, flame-covered tongues, they burn through Durant's steel bodies and consume their insides.

name: Heatmor
description: It draws in air through its tail, transforms it into fire, and uses it like a tongue. It melts Durant and eats them.

name: Heatmor
description: A flame serves as its tongue, melting through the hard shell of Durant so that Heatmor can devour their insides.

name: Heatmor
description: There's a hole in its tail that allows it to draw in the air it needs to keep its fire burning. If the hole gets blocked, this Pokemon will fall ill.

name: Durant
description: Durant dig nests in mountains. They build their complicated, interconnected tunnels into mazes.

name: Durant
description: They attack in groups, covering themselves in steel armor to protect themselves from Heatmor.

name: Durant
description: They attack in groups, covering themselves in steel armor to protect themselves from Heatmor.

name: Durant
description: They lay their eggs deep inside their nests. When attacked by Heatmor, they retaliate using their massive mandibles.

name: Durant
description: With their large mandibles, these Pokemon can crunch their way through rock. They work together to protect their eggs from Sandaconda.

name: Durant
description: Individuals each play different roles in driving Heatmor, their natural predator, away from their colony.

name: Durant
description: Individuals each play different roles in driving Heatmor, their natural predator, away from their colony.

name: Deino
description: They cannot see, so they tackle and bite to learn about their surroundings. Their bodies are covered in wounds.

name: Deino
description: Lacking sight, it's unaware of its surroundings, so it bumps into things and eats anything that moves.

name: Deino
description: When it encounters something, its first urge is usually to bite it. If it likes what it tastes, it will commit the associated scent to memory.

name: Deino
description: Because it can't see, this Pokemon is constantly biting at everything it touches, trying to keep track of its surroundings.

name: Deino
description: Lacking sight, it's unaware of its surroundings, so it bumps into things and eats anything that moves.

name: Deino
description: They cannot see, so they tackle and bite to learn about their surroundings. Their bodies are covered in wounds.

name: Deino
description: It tends to bite everything, and it is not a picky eater. Approaching it carelessly is dangerous.

name: Zweilous
description: While hunting for prey, Zweilous wanders its territory, its two heads often bickering over which way to go.

name: Zweilous
description: After it has eaten up all the food in its territory, it moves to another area. Its two heads do not get along.

name: Zweilous
description: The two heads do not get along. Whichever head eats more than the other gets to be the leader.

name: Zweilous
description: Since their two heads do not get along and compete with each other for food, they always eat too much.

name: Zweilous
description: The two heads do not get along. Whichever head eats more than the other gets to be the leader.

name: Zweilous
description: After it has eaten up all the food in its territory, it moves to another area. Its two heads do not get along.

name: Zweilous
description: Their two heads will fight each other over a single piece of food. Zweilous are covered in scars even without battling others.

name: Hydreigon
description: The three heads take turns sinking their teeth into the opponent. Their attacks won't slow until their target goes down.

name: Hydreigon
description: It responds to movement by attacking. This scary, three-headed Pokemon devours everything in its path!

name: Hydreigon
description: The heads on their arms do not have brains. They use all three heads to consume and destroy everything.

name: Hydreigon
description: It responds to movement by attacking. This scary, three-headed Pokemon devours everything in its path!

name: Hydreigon
description: The heads on their arms do not have brains. They use all three heads to consume and destroy everything.

name: Hydreigon
description: This brutal Pokemon travels the skies on its six wings. Anything that moves seems like a foe to it, triggering its attack.

name: Hydreigon
description: There are a slew of stories about villages that were destroyed by Hydreigon. It bites anything that moves.

name: Larvesta
description: Larvesta's body is warm all over. It spouts fire from the tips of its horns to intimidate predators and scare prey.

name: Larvesta
description: The people of ancient times believed that Larvesta fell from the sun.

name: Larvesta
description: It protects itself with flame. Long years ago, people believed Larvesta had a nest on the sun.

name: Larvesta
description: Said to have been born from the sun, it spews fire from its horns and encases itself in a cocoon of fire when it evolves.

name: Larvesta
description: The base of volcanoes is where they make their homes. They shoot fire from their five horns to repel attacking enemies.

name: Larvesta
description: When battling opponents, it sprays fire from its five horns. The max temperature of the flames can reach nearly 5,500 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Larvesta
description: Said to have been born from the sun, it spews fire from its horns and encases itself in a cocoon of fire when it evolves.

name: Larvesta
description: This Pokemon was believed to have been born from the sun. When it evolves, its entire body is engulfed in flames.

name: Larvesta
description: The base of volcanoes is where they make their homes. They shoot fire from their five horns to repel attacking enemies.

name: Volcarona
description: A sea of fire engulfs the surroundings of their battles, since they use their six wings to scatter their ember scales.

name: Volcarona
description: Volcarona scatters burning scales. Some say it does this to start fires. Others say it's trying to rescue those that suffer in the cold.

name: Volcarona
description: According to legends, it was hatched from a flaming cocoon to save people and Pokemon that were suffering from the cold.

name: Volcarona
description: Thought to be an embodiment of the sun, it appeared during a bitterly cold winter and saved Pokemon from freezing.

name: Volcarona
description: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it is said that Volcarona's fire provided a replacement for the sun.

name: Volcarona
description: As it flies, it scatters its flaming scales. It was feared by ancient people, who referred to it as "the rage of the sun."

name: Volcarona
description: This Pokemon emerges from a cocoon formed of raging flames. Ancient murals depict Volcarona as a deity of fire.

name: Volcarona
description: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it is said that Volcarona's fire provided a replacement for the sun.

name: Volcarona
description: A sea of fire engulfs the surroundings of their battles, since they use their six wings to scatter their ember scales.

name: Cobalion
description: It has a body and heart of steel. Its glare is sufficient to make even an unruly Pokemon obey it.

name: Cobalion
description: This legendary Pokemon battled against humans to protect Pokemon. Its personality is calm and composed.

name: Cobalion
description: It has a body and heart of steel. It worked with its allies to punish people when they hurt Pokemon.

name: Cobalion
description: From the moment it's born, this Pokemon radiates the air of a leader. Its presence will calm even vicious foes.

name: Cobalion
description: This Pokemon appears in a legend alongside Terrakion and Virizion, fighting against humans in defense of the Unova region's Pokemon.

name: Cobalion
description: It has a body and heart of steel. It worked with its allies to punish people when they hurt Pokemon.

name: Cobalion
description: It has a body and heart of steel. Its glare is sufficient to make even an unruly Pokemon obey it.

name: Terrakion
description: In Unovan legend, Terrakion battled against humans in an effort to protect other Pokemon.

name: Terrakion
description: It has phenomenal power. It will mercilessly crush anyone or anything that bullies small Pokemon.

name: Terrakion
description: Spoken of in legend, this Pokemon used its phenomenal power to destroy a castle in its effort to protect Pokemon.

name: Terrakion
description: Its charge is strong enough to break through a giant castle wall in one blow. This Pokemon is spoken of in legends.

name: Terrakion
description: Spoken of in legend, this Pokemon used its phenomenal power to destroy a castle in its effort to protect Pokemon.

name: Terrakion
description: Its charge is strong enough to break through a giant castle wall in one blow. This Pokemon is spoken of in legends.

name: Terrakion
description: This Pokemon came to the defense of Pokemon that had lost their homes in a war among humans.

name: Virizion
description: Legends say this Pokemon confounded opponents with its swift movements.

name: Virizion
description: Its head sprouts horns as sharp as blades. Using whirlwind-like movements, it confounds and swiftly cuts opponents.

name: Virizion
description: This Pokemon fought humans in order to protect its friends. Legends about it continue to be passed down.

name: Virizion
description: It darts around opponents with a flurry of quick movements, slicing them up with its horns.

name: Virizion
description: Its head sprouts horns as sharp as blades. Using whirlwind-like movements, it confounds and swiftly cuts opponents.

name: Virizion
description: Legends say this Pokemon confounded opponents with its swift movements.

name: Virizion
description: A legend tells of this Pokemon working together with Cobalion and Terrakion to protect the Pokemon of the Unova region.

name: Tornadus
description: The lower half of its body is wrapped in a cloud of energy. It zooms through the sky at 200 mph.

name: Tornadus
description: Tornadus expels massive energy from its tail, causing severe storms. Its power is great enough to blow houses away.

name: Tornadus
description: In every direction it flies, creating winds so powerful, they blow everything away.

name: Tornadus
description: The lower half of its body is wrapped in a cloud of energy. It zooms through the sky at 200 mph.

name: Tornadus
description: Tornadus expels massive energy from its tail, causing severe storms. Its power is great enough to blow houses away.

name: Thundurus
description: As it flies around, it shoots lightning all over the place and causes forest fires. It is therefore disliked.

name: Thundurus
description: The spikes on its tail discharge immense bolts of lightning. It flies around the Unova region firing off lightning bolts.

name: Thundurus
description: As it flies around, it shoots lightning all over the place and causes forest fires. It is therefore disliked.

name: Thundurus
description: The spikes on its tail discharge immense bolts of lightning. It flies around the Unova region firing off lightning bolts.

name: Thundurus
description: Countless charred remains mar the landscape of places through which Thundurus has passed.

name: Reshiram
description: When Reshiram's tail flares, the heat energy moves the atmosphere and changes the world's weather.

name: Reshiram
description: This Pokemon appears in legends. It sends flames into the air from its tail, burning up everything around it.

name: Reshiram
description: When Reshiram's tail flares, the heat energy moves the atmosphere and changes the world's weather.

name: Reshiram
description: According to myth, if people ignore truth and let themselves become consumed by greed, Reshiram will arrive to burn their kingdoms down.

name: Reshiram
description: This legendary Pokemon can scorch the world with fire. It helps those who want to build a world of truth.

name: Reshiram
description: This legendary Pokemon can scorch the world with fire. It helps those who want to build a world of truth.

name: Reshiram
description: Flames spew from its tail as it flies through the sky like a jet airplane. It's said that this Pokemon will scorch the world.

name: Zekrom
description: This Pokemon appears in legends. In its tail, it has a giant generator that creates electricity.

name: Zekrom
description: This legendary Pokemon can scorch the world with lightning. It assists those who want to build an ideal world.

name: Zekrom
description: Concealing itself in lightning clouds, it flies throughout the Unova region. It creates electricity in its tail.

name: Zekrom
description: When the interior part of its tail spins like a motor, Zekrom can generate many bolts of lightning to blast its surroundings.

name: Zekrom
description: Mythology tells us that if people lose the righteousness in their hearts, their kingdoms will be razed by Zekrom's lightning.

name: Zekrom
description: Concealing itself in lightning clouds, it flies throughout the Unova region. It creates electricity in its tail.

name: Zekrom
description: This legendary Pokemon can scorch the world with lightning. It assists those who want to build an ideal world.

name: Landorus
description: From the forces of lightning and wind, it creates energy to give nutrients to the soil and make the land abundant.

name: Landorus
description: The energy that comes pouring from its tail increases the nutrition in the soil, making crops grow to great size.

name: Landorus
description: Lands visited by Landorus grant such bountiful crops that it has been hailed as "The Guardian of the Fields."

name: Landorus
description: From the forces of lightning and wind, it creates energy to give nutrients to the soil and make the land abundant.

name: Landorus
description: Lands visited by Landorus grant such bountiful crops that it has been hailed as "The Guardian of the Fields."

name: Kyurem
description: It generates a powerful, freezing energy inside itself, but its body became frozen when the energy leaked out.

name: Kyurem
description: It can produce ultracold air. Its body is frozen.

name: Kyurem
description: This legendary ice Pokemon waits for a hero to fill in the missing parts of its body with truth or ideals.

name: Kyurem
description: This legendary ice Pokemon waits for a hero to fill in the missing parts of its body with truth or ideals.

name: Kyurem
description: It generates a powerful, freezing energy inside itself, but its body became frozen when the energy leaked out.

name: Kyurem
description: Dwelling within it is a power even greater than that of Reshiram or Zekrom, but the extreme cold keeps that power bound.

name: Kyurem
description: It appears that this Pokemon uses its powers over ice to freeze its own body in order to stabilize its cellular structure.

name: Keldeo
description: When it is resolute, its body fills with power and it becomes swifter. Its jumps are then too fast to follow.

name: Keldeo
description: It crosses the world, running over the surfaces of oceans and rivers. It appears at scenic waterfronts.

name: Keldeo
description: By blasting water from its hooves, it can glide across water. It excels at using leg moves while battling.

name: Keldeo
description: It crosses the world, running over the surfaces of oceans and rivers. It appears at scenic waterfronts.

name: Keldeo
description: When it is resolute, its body fills with power and it becomes swifter. Its jumps are then too fast to follow.

name: Meloetta
description: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feelings of those who hear it.

name: Meloetta
description: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feelings of those who hear it.

name: Meloetta
description: The melodies sung by Meloetta have the power to make Pokemon that hear them happy or sad.

name: Meloetta
description: The melodies sung by Meloetta have the power to make Pokemon that hear them happy or sad.

name: Meloetta
description: Many famous songs have been inspired by the melodies that Meloetta plays.

name: Genesect
description: This Pokemon existed 300 million years ago. Team Plasma altered it and attached a cannon to its back.

name: Genesect
description: This Pokemon existed 300 million years ago. Team Plasma altered it and attached a cannon to its back.

name: Genesect
description: This ancient bug Pokemon was altered by Team Plasma. They upgraded the cannon on its back.

name: Genesect
description: This ancient bug Pokemon was altered by Team Plasma. They upgraded the cannon on its back.

name: Genesect
description: Over 300 million years ago, it was feared as the strongest of hunters. It has been modified by Team Plasma.

name: Chespin
description: Such a thick shell of wood covers its head and back that even a direct hit from a truck wouldn't faze it.

name: Chespin
description: The quills on its head are usually soft. When it flexes them, the points become so hard and sharp that they can pierce rock.

name: Quilladin
description: It relies on its sturdy shell to deflect predators' attacks. It counterattacks with its sharp quills.

name: Quilladin
description: They strengthen their lower bodies by running into one another. They are very kind and won't start fights.

name: Chesnaught
description: When it takes a defensive posture with its fists guarding its face, it could withstand a bomb blast.

name: Chesnaught
description: Its Tackle is forceful enough to flip a 50-ton tank. It shields its allies from danger with its own body.

name: Fennekin
description: Eating a twig fills it with energy, and its roomy ears give vent to air hotter than 390 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Fennekin
description: As it walks, it munches on a twig in place of a snack. It intimidates opponents by puffing hot air out of its ears.

name: Braixen
description: When the twig is plucked from its tail, friction sets the twig alight. The flame is used to send signals to its allies.

name: Braixen
description: It has a twig stuck in its tail. With friction from its tail fur, it sets the twig on fire and launches into battle.

name: Delphox
description: Using psychic power, it generates a fiery vortex of 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit, incinerating foes swept into this whirl of flame.

name: Delphox
description: It gazes into the flame at the tip of its branch to achieve a focused state, which allows it to see into the future.

name: Froakie
description: It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back. The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise take when attacked.

name: Froakie
description: It protects its skin by covering its body in delicate bubbles. Beneath its happy-go-lucky air, it keeps a watchful eye on its surroundings.

name: Frogadier
description: It can throw bubble-covered pebbles with precise control, hitting empty cans up to a hundred feet away.

name: Frogadier
description: Its swiftness is unparalleled. It can scale a tower of more than 2,000 feet in a minute's time.

name: Greninja
description: It appears and vanishes with a ninja's grace. It toys with its enemies using swift movements, while slicing them with throwing stars of sharpest water.

name: Greninja
description: It creates throwing stars out of compressed water. When it spins them and throws them at high speed, these stars can split metal in two.

name: Bunnelby
description: It has ears like shovels. Digging holes strengthens its ears so much that they can sever thick roots effortlessly.

name: Bunnelby
description: It's very sensitive to danger. The sound of Corviknight's flapping will have Bunnelby digging a hole to hide underground in moments.

name: Bunnelby
description: It excels at digging holes. Using its ears, it can dig a nest 33 feet deep in one night.

name: Bunnelby
description: They use their large ears to dig burrows. They will dig the whole night through.

name: Diggersby
description: With their powerful ears, they can heft boulders of a ton or more with ease. They can be a big help at construction sites.

name: Diggersby
description: The fur on its belly retains heat exceptionally well. People used to make heavy winter clothing from fur shed by this Pokemon.

name: Diggersby
description: With power equal to an excavator, it can dig through dense bedrock. It's a huge help during tunnel construction.

name: Diggersby
description: As powerful as an excavator, its ears can reduce dense bedrock to rubble. When it's finished digging, it lounges lazily.

name: Fletchling
description: When this Pokemon gets excited, its body temperature increases sharply. If you touch a Fletchling with bare hands, you might get burned.

name: Fletchling
description: Its melodious cries are actually warnings. Fletchling will mercilessly peck at anything that enters its territory.

name: Fletchling
description: Its body is always warm. Trainers who live in cold areas apparently sleep with it in their bed.

name: Fletchling
description: While it's an amiable Pokemon, if you touch it unexpectedly, it will heat up its body in an instant, and you'll be burned.

name: Fletchling
description: When it's excited, its temperature can double, spiking hormone production in its body.

name: Fletchling
description: This amiable Pokemon is easy to train. But when battle is joined, it shows its ferocious side.

name: Fletchling
description: Despite the beauty of its lilting voice, it's merciless to intruders that enter its territory.

name: Fletchling
description: These friendly Pokemon send signals to one another with beautiful chirps and tail-feather movements.

name: Fletchinder
description: Its speed right after takeoff already puts it in the top speed class of all bird Pokemon.

name: Fletchinder
description: Fletchinder launches embers into the den of its prey. When the prey comes leaping out, Fletchinder's sharp talons finish it off.

name: Fletchinder
description: The hotter the flame sac on its belly, the faster it can fly, but it takes some time to get the fire going.

name: Fletchinder
description: From its beak, it expels embers that set the tall grass on fire. Then it pounces on the bewildered prey that pop out of the grass.

name: Fletchinder
description: It scatters embers in the tall grass. Then bug Pokemon, frightened by the flames, come flying out, and Fletchinder gobbles them up.

name: Fletchinder
description: It will not tolerate other Fletchinder entering its territory, which has a radius of several miles.

name: Fletchinder
description: From its beak, it fires embers at its prey. Once it has caught them, it grills them at high heat before feasting upon them.

name: Fletchinder
description: Fletchinder are exceedingly territorial and aggressive. These Pokemon fight among themselves over feeding grounds.

name: Talonflame
description: Its tough wings don't allow fire to pass through them. A long time ago, firefighters' outfits were made from Talonflame wings.

name: Talonflame
description: Talonflame dives toward prey at speeds of up to 310 mph and assaults them with powerful kicks, giving the prey no chance to escape.

name: Talonflame
description: Its favorite foods are Wingull and Pikipek. It attacks with a powerful kick and grasps them firmly in its talons.

name: Talonflame
description: When attacking prey, it can reach speeds of up to 310 mph. It finishes its prey off with a colossal kick.

name: Talonflame
description: In the fever of an exciting battle, it showers embers from the gaps between its feathers and takes to the air.

name: Talonflame
description: Talonflame mainly preys upon other bird Pokemon. To intimidate opponents, it sends embers spewing from gaps between its feathers.

name: Talonflame
description: Bird Pokemon make up most of its diet. It approaches at high speeds and smacks them down to the ground with its powerful kick.

name: Talonflame
description: It zooms directly at its prey at flight speeds of close to 310 mph, while fiery embers scatter from gaps in its feathers.

name: Scatterbug
description: The powder that covers its body regulates its temperature, so it can live in any region or climate.

name: Scatterbug
description: When under attack from bird Pokemon, it spews a poisonous black powder that causes paralysis on contact.

name: Spewpa
description: It lives hidden within thicket shadows. When predators attack, it quickly bristles the fur covering its body in an effort to threaten them.

name: Spewpa
description: The beaks of bird Pokemon can't begin to scratch its stalwart body. To defend itself, it spews powder.

name: Vivillon
description: Vivillon with many different patterns are found all over the world. These patterns are affected by the climate of their habitat.

name: Vivillon
description: The patterns on this Pokemon's wings depend on the climate and topography of its habitat. It scatters colorful scales.

name: Litleo
description: The stronger the opponent it faces, the more heat surges from its mane and the more power flows through its body.

name: Litleo
description: They set off on their own from their pride and live by themselves to become stronger. These hot-blooded Pokemon are quick to fight.

name: Litleo
description: When they're young, they live with a pride. Once they're able to hunt prey on their own, they're kicked out and have to make their own way.

name: Litleo
description: This hot-blooded Pokemon is filled with curiosity. When it gets angry or starts fighting, its short mane gets hot.

name: Pyroar
description: The male with the largest mane of fire is the leader of the pride.

name: Pyroar
description: With fiery breath of more than 10,000 degrees Fahrenheit, they viciously threaten any challenger. The females protect the pride's cubs.

name: Pyroar
description: The males are usually lazy, but when attacked by a strong foe, a male will protect its friends with no regard for its own safety.

name: Pyroar
description: The temperature of its breath is over 10,000 degrees Fahrenheit, but Pyroar doesn't use it on its prey. This Pokemon prefers to eat raw meat.

name: Flabb
description: It draws out and controls the hidden power of flowers. The flower Flabebe holds is most likely part of its body.

name: Flabb
description: When it finds a flower it likes, it dwells on that flower its whole life long. It floats in the wind's embrace with an untroubled heart.

name: Flabb
description: It's not safe without the power of a flower, but it will keep traveling around until it finds one with the color and shape it wants.

name: Flabb
description: Flabebe wears a crown made from pollen it's collected from its flower. The crown has hidden healing properties.

name: Floette
description: It raises flowers and uses them as weapons. The more gorgeous the blossom, the more power it contains.

name: Floette
description: When the flowers of a well-tended flower bed bloom, it appears and celebrates with an elegant dance.

name: Floette
description: It gives its own power to flowers, pouring its heart into caring for them. Floette never forgives anyone who messes up a flower bed.

name: Floette
description: It flutters around fields of flowers and cares for flowers that are starting to wilt. It draws out the hidden power of flowers to battle.

name: Florges
description: It controls the flowers it grows. The petal blizzards that Florges triggers are overwhelming in their beauty and power.

name: Florges
description: Its life can span several hundred years. It's said to devote its entire life to protecting gardens.

name: Florges
description: It claims exquisite flower gardens as its territory, and it obtains power from basking in the energy emitted by flowering plants.

name: Florges
description: In times long past, governors of castles would invite Florges to create flower gardens to embellish the castle domains.

name: Skiddo
description: If it has sunshine and water, it doesn't need to eat, because it can generate energy from the leaves on its back.

name: Skiddo
description: Thought to be one of the first Pokemon to live in harmony with humans, it has a placid disposition.

name: Gogoat
description: It can tell how its Trainer is feeling by subtle shifts in the grip on its horns. This empathic sense lets them run as if one being.

name: Gogoat
description: They inhabit mountainous regions. The leader of the herd is decided by a battle of clashing horns.

name: Pancham
description: It does its level best to glare and pull a scary face, but it can't help grinning if anyone pats its head.

name: Pancham
description: Wanting to make sure it's taken seriously, Pancham's always giving others a glare. But if it's not focusing, it ends up smiling.

name: Pancham
description: It chooses a Pangoro as its master and then imitates its master's actions. This is how it learns to battle and hunt for prey.

name: Pancham
description: It's desperate to intimidate its opponents. Be nice and pretend to be scared if you catch it glaring at you intensely.

name: Pancham
description: It does its best to be taken seriously by its enemies, but its glare is not sufficiently intimidating. Chewing on a leaf is its trademark.

name: Pancham
description: It follows Pangoro around like a henchman. When Pancham makes a big mistake, its leaf gets taken away.

name: Pancham
description: There's no point to the leaf in its mouth, aside from an effort to look cool. It's mischievous, so it's not well suited to inexperienced Trainers.

name: Pancham
description: It grows up imitating the behavior of Pangoro, which it looks up to as a leader.

name: Pangoro
description: It boasts superb physical strength. Those who wish to become Pangoro's Trainer have no choice but to converse with their fists.

name: Pangoro
description: From the slight twitches of its bamboo leaf, it deduces its opponent's movements. It's eager to tussle but kindhearted toward its companions.

name: Pangoro
description: Pangoro is the type to talk with its fists. It doesn't say much as it pummels opponents with enough force to send a dump truck flying.

name: Pangoro
description: This Pokemon is quick to anger, and it has no problem using its prodigious strength to get its way. It lives for duels against Obstagoon.

name: Pangoro
description: Using its leaf, Pangoro can predict the moves of its opponents. It strikes with punches that can turn a dump truck into scrap with just one hit.

name: Pangoro
description: This rowdy Pokemon boasts great physical strength. Many Trainers are also smitten by its lively character.

name: Pangoro
description: It charges ahead and bashes its opponents like a berserker, uncaring about any hits it might take. Its arms are mighty enough to snap a telephone pole.

name: Pangoro
description: Although it possesses a violent temperament, it won't put up with bullying. It uses the leaf in its mouth to sense the movements of its enemies.

name: Furfrou
description: Trimming its fluffy fur not only makes it more elegant but also increases the swiftness of its movements.

name: Furfrou
description: Historically, in the Kalos region, these Pokemon were the designated guardians of the king.

name: Furfrou
description: There was an era when aristocrats would compete to see who could trim their Furfrou's fur into the most exquisite style.

name: Furfrou
description: Left alone, its fur will grow longer and longer, but it will only allow someone it trusts to cut it.

name: Espurr
description: The organ that emits its intense psychic power is sheltered by its ears to keep power from leaking out.

name: Espurr
description: There's enough psychic power in Espurr to send a wrestler flying, but because this power can't be controlled, Espurr finds it troublesome.

name: Espurr
description: Though Espurr's expression never changes, behind that blank stare is an intense struggle to contain its devastating psychic power.

name: Espurr
description: It has enough psychic energy to blast everything within 300 feet of itself, but it has no control over its power.

name: Meowstic
description: When in danger, it raises its ears and releases enough psychic power to grind a 10-ton truck into dust.

name: Meowstic
description: The eyeball patterns on the interior of its ears emit psychic energy. It keeps the patterns tightly covered because that power is too immense.

name: Honedge
description: Honedge's soul once belonged to a person who was killed a long time ago by the sword that makes up Honedge's body.

name: Honedge
description: Apparently this Pokemon is born when a departed spirit inhabits a sword. It attaches itself to people and drinks their life force.

name: Honedge
description: If anyone dares to grab its hilt, it wraps a blue cloth around that person's arm and drains that person's life energy completely.

name: Honedge
description: The blue eye on the sword's handguard is the true body of Honedge. With its old cloth, it drains people's lives away.

name: Doublade
description: The complex attack patterns of its two swords are unstoppable, even for an opponent greatly accomplished at swordplay.

name: Doublade
description: When Honedge evolves, it divides into two swords, which cooperate via telepathy to coordinate attacks and slash their enemies to ribbons.

name: Doublade
description: Honedge evolves into twins. The two blades rub together to emit a metallic sound that unnerves opponents.

name: Doublade
description: The two swords employ a strategy of rapidly alternating between offense and defense to bring down their prey.

name: Aegislash
description: Generations of kings were attended by these Pokemon, which used their spectral power to manipulate and control people and Pokemon.

name: Aegislash
description: Apparently, it can detect the innate qualities of leadership. According to legend, whoever it recognizes is destined to become king.

name: Spritzee
description: A scent pouch within this Pokemon's body allows it to create various scents. A change in its diet will alter the fragrance it produces.

name: Spritzee
description: In the past, rather than using perfume, royal ladies carried a Spritzee that would waft a fragrance they liked.

name: Spritzee
description: The scent its body gives off enraptures those who smell it. Noble ladies had no shortage of love for Spritzee.

name: Spritzee
description: It emits a scent that enraptures those who smell it. This fragrance changes depending on what it has eaten.

name: Aromatisse
description: The scent that constantly emits from its fur is so powerful that this Pokemon's companions will eventually lose their sense of smell.

name: Aromatisse
description: The scents Aromatisse can produce range from sweet smells that bolster allies to foul smells that sap an opponent's will to fight.

name: Aromatisse
description: It devises various scents, pleasant and unpleasant, and emits scents that its enemies dislike in order to gain an edge in battle.

name: Aromatisse
description: Its scent is so overpowering that, unless a Trainer happens to really enjoy the smell, he or she will have a hard time walking alongside it.

name: Swirlix
description: It eats its own weight in sugar every day. If it doesn't get enough sugar, it becomes incredibly grumpy.

name: Swirlix
description: To entangle its opponents in battle, it extrudes white threads as sweet and sticky as cotton candy.

name: Swirlix
description: The sweet smell of cotton candy perfumes Swirlix's fluffy fur. This Pokemon spits out sticky string to tangle up its enemies.

name: Swirlix
description: Because it eats nothing but sweets, its fur is as sticky sweet as cotton candy.

name: Slurpuff
description: It can distinguish the faintest of scents. It puts its sensitive sense of smell to use by helping pastry chefs in their work.

name: Slurpuff
description: Its sense of smell is 100 million times better than a human's, so even the faintest scent tells it about everything in the area. It's like it can see with its nose!

name: Slurpuff
description: By taking in a person's scent, it can sniff out their mental and physical condition. It's hoped that this skill will have many medical applications.

name: Slurpuff
description: Slurpuff's fur contains a lot of air, making it soft to the touch and lighter than it looks.

name: Inkay
description: It spins while making its luminescent spots flash. These spots allow it to communicate with others by using different patterns of light.

name: Inkay
description: When exchanging information with others of its kind, it flashes the light-emitting spots on its body in a complex rhythm.

name: Inkay
description: It flashes the light-emitting spots on its body, which drains its opponent's will to fight. It takes the opportunity to scuttle away and hide.

name: Inkay
description: Opponents who stare at the flashing of the light-emitting spots on its body become dazed and lose their will to fight.

name: Inkay
description: It draws prey near with its blinking lights and then wraps them up in its long tentacles and holds them in place.

name: Inkay
description: By exposing foes to the blinking of its luminescent spots, Inkay demoralizes them, and then it seizes the chance to flee.

name: Malamar
description: Gazing at its luminescent spots will quickly induce a hypnotic state, putting the observer under Malamar's control.

name: Malamar
description: It flashes the pattern on its torso to control its prey and draw them in. The edges of its fins are supremely sharp.

name: Malamar
description: When it comes to strong hypnosis, there's an endless number of people who utilize Malamar for their nefarious deeds.

name: Malamar
description: It lures its prey close with hypnotic motions, then wraps its tentacles around it before finishing it off with digestive fluids.

name: Malamar
description: It wields the most compelling hypnotic powers of any Pokemon, and it forces others to do whatever it wants.

name: Malamar
description: It's said that Malamar's hypnotic powers played a role in certain history-changing events.

name: Binacle
description: Two Binacle live together on one rock. When they fight, one of them will move to a different rock.

name: Binacle
description: They stretch and then contract, yanking their rocks along with them in bold hops. They eat seaweed that washes up on the shoreline.

name: Binacle
description: If the two don't work well together, both their offense and defense fall apart. Without good teamwork, they won't survive.

name: Binacle
description: After two Binacle find a suitably sized rock, they adhere themselves to it and live together. They cooperate to gather food during high tide.

name: Barbaracle
description: Having an eye on each palm allows it to keep watch in all directions. In a pinch, its limbs start to act on their own to ensure the enemy's defeat.

name: Barbaracle
description: Seven Binacle come together to form one Barbaracle. The Binacle that serves as the head gives orders to those serving as the limbs.

name: Barbaracle
description: Barbaracle's legs and hands have minds of their own, and they will move independently. But they usually follow the head's orders.

name: Barbaracle
description: When they evolve, two Binacle multiply into seven. They fight with the power of seven Binacle.

name: Skrelp
description: It looks just like rotten kelp. It hides from foes while storing up power for its evolution.

name: Skrelp
description: It vanishes into seaweed and remains perfectly still to avoid attacks from large Pokemon. Rotten seaweed is its main food source.

name: Skrelp
description: Camouflaged as rotten kelp, they spray liquid poison on prey that approaches unawares and then finish it off.

name: Skrelp
description: It's not good at swimming, so it clings to the seaweed. In the Alola region, it's often found near Dhelmise.

name: Skrelp
description: It drifts in the ocean, blending in with floating seaweed. When other Pokemon come to feast on the seaweed, Skrelp feasts on them instead.

name: Skrelp
description: Skrelp looks like a piece of rotten seaweed, so it can blend in with seaweed drifting on the ocean and avoid being detected by enemies.

name: Dragalge
description: Their poison is strong enough to eat through the hull of a tanker, and they spit it indiscriminately at anything that enters their territory.

name: Dragalge
description: Dragalge generates dragon energy by sticking the plume on its head out above the ocean's surface and bathing it in sunlight.

name: Dragalge
description: Dragalge uses a poisonous liquid capable of corroding metal to send tankers that enter its territory to the bottom of the sea.

name: Dragalge
description: It blends in with seaweed to ambush its prey and then takes them down with a poisonous liquid strong enough to melt metal.

name: Dragalge
description: This vicious Pokemon sprays a poisonous liquid on opponents that come near. For whatever reason, it gets along really well with Dhelmise.

name: Dragalge
description: Tales are told of ships that wander into seas where Dragalge live, never to return.

name: Clauncher
description: Through controlled explosions of internal gas, it can expel water like a pistol shot. At close distances, it can shatter rock.

name: Clauncher
description: By detonating gas that accumulates in its right claw, this Pokemon launches water like a bullet. This is how Clauncher defeats its enemies.

name: Clauncher
description: They knock down flying prey by firing compressed water from their massive claws like shooting a pistol.

name: Clauncher
description: Clauncher's claws can fall off during battle, but they'll regenerate. The meat inside the claws is popular as a delicacy in Galar.

name: Clauncher
description: It moves around by jetting water from its right pincer. It has a poor sense of balance, so it's terrible at swimming straight.

name: Clauncher
description: Its claws occasionally fall off, and it keeps a low profile until they grow back. The meat of its claws is so delicious!

name: Clawitzer
description: After using the feelers on its oversized claw to detect the location of prey, Clawitzer launches a cannonball of water at its target.

name: Clawitzer
description: Clawitzer's right arm is a cannon that launches projectiles made of seawater. Shots from a Clawitzer's cannon arm can sink a tanker.

name: Clawitzer
description: Their enormous claws launch cannonballs of water powerful enough to pierce tanker hulls.

name: Clawitzer
description: It compresses the water it has sucked up and then projects it with enough power to punch a hole right through a thick sheet of iron.

name: Clawitzer
description: By expelling water from the nozzle in the back of its claw, it can move at a speed of 60 knots.

name: Clawitzer
description: Its right arm is packed with meat. When its pincer falls off, it's exported to be used as a cooking ingredient.

name: Helioptile
description: The frills on either side of its head have cells that generate electricity when exposed to sunlight.

name: Helioptile
description: When spread, the frills on its head act like solar panels, generating the power behind this Pokemon's electric moves.

name: Helioptile
description: The sun powers this Pokemon's electricity generation. Interruption of that process stresses Helioptile to the point of weakness.

name: Helioptile
description: They make their home in deserts. They can generate their energy from basking in the sun, so eating food is not a requirement.

name: Heliolisk
description: One Heliolisk basking in the sun with its frill outspread is all it would take to produce enough electricity to power a city.

name: Heliolisk
description: A now-vanished desert culture treasured these Pokemon. Appropriately, when Heliolisk came to the Galar region, treasure came with them.

name: Heliolisk
description: They flare their frills and generate energy. A single Heliolisk can generate sufficient electricity to power a skyscraper.

name: Heliolisk
description: It stimulates its muscles with electricity, boosting the strength in its legs and enabling it to run 100 yards in five seconds.

name: Tyrunt
description: This is an ancient Pokemon, revived in modern times. It has a violent disposition, and it'll tear apart anything it gets between its hefty jaws.

name: Tyrunt
description: Its large jaw has incredible destructive power. Some theories suggest that its restored form is different from its form of long ago.

name: Tyrunt
description: Its immense jaws have enough destructive force that it can chew up an automobile. It lived 100 million years ago.

name: Tyrunt
description: This Pokemon was restored from a fossil. If something happens that it doesn't like, it throws a tantrum and runs wild.

name: Tyrunt
description: This Pokemon is selfish and likes to be pampered. It can also inflict grievous wounds on its Trainer just by playing around.

name: Tyrunt
description: Tyrunt is spoiled and selfish. It may just be trying to frolic, but sometimes the ones it's trying to frolic with are gravely injured.

name: Tyrantrum
description: Nothing could stop this Pokemon 100 million years ago, so it behaved like a king.

name: Tyrantrum
description: The king of the ancient world, it can easily crunch a car with the devastating strength of its enormous jaws.

name: Tyrantrum
description: Thanks to its gargantuan jaws, which could shred thick metal plates as if they were paper, it was invincible in the ancient world it once inhabited.

name: Tyrantrum
description: Complete restoration is impossible, allowing room for theories that its entire body was once covered in a feather-like coat.

name: Tyrantrum
description: This Pokemon is from about 100,000,000 years ago. It has the presence of a king, vicious but magnificent.

name: Tyrantrum
description: A single bite of Tyrantrum's massive jaws will demolish a car. This Pokemon was the king of the ancient world.

name: Amaura
description: Amaura was restored successfully, but it's not expected to live long because of the heat of the current environment.

name: Amaura
description: Amaura is an ancient Pokemon that has gone extinct. Specimens of this species can sometimes be found frozen in ice.

name: Amaura
description: This Pokemon was successfully restored from a fossil. In the past, it lived with others of its kind in cold lands where there were fewer predators.

name: Amaura
